title: It’s NAIDOC Week and they don’t want your child to forget it
creator: Colleen Harkin
content: Here we go again. It’s NAIDOC Week – the annual event which grew from the first observances of the National Day of Mourning event to a week-long recognition of the history, culture, and achievements of Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander peoples.Across the country, schools run themed assemblies, while education content providers fall over themselves to push NAIDOC-branded classroom resources. Public transport operators, local councils, community groups, and corporate organisations all join in, blanketing the week with promotional collateral – each seemingly competing to outdo the others in symbolic virtue.Annual slogans are framed around sovereignty and land rights and political reform and activism. This year’s slogan to assist in the social engineering crusade is:‘The Next Generation: Strength, Vision & Legacy.’There are wristbands, posters that promote treaty and sovereignty, and worksheet activities that walk children through concepts such as ‘invasion’ and ‘decolonisation’, promoting a grievance-based narrative that casts Aboriginal Australians as perpetual victims and others as oppressors – fostering division and resentment, not understanding.And this saturation is not limited to NAIDOC Week alone. In addition to NAIDOC week, there is National Reconciliation Week and Sorry Day, as well as a range of other individual days scheduled in the calendar.In educational settings, promotion of these named days comes in addition to a cross-curriculum priority in the National...

title: Police officer shot in violent 'organized attack' on ICE detention facility
creator: Josh DuBose
content: Ten people have been arrested and charged with attempted murder of federal officers in connection with a violent and brazen Independence Day attack on an Immigration and Customs Enforcement detention center that left a local police officer wounded by gunfire, the Department of Justice announced this week. The July 4 “organized attack,” according to a DOJ news release, unfolded just after 10:30 p.m. at the Prairieland Detention Center in Alvarado, Texas, a town of about 6,200 residents some 28 miles south of Ft. Worth. Authorities said the defendants, all dressed in black military-style clothing, were equipped with body armor, two-way radios and firearms, including AR-style rifles recovered at the scene. About ten minutes after assembling outside the facility, two of the individuals reportedly peeled away from the main group and tagged several vehicles and a guard structure with graffiti, spray painting the word “traitor” and the phrase “ICE Pig” federal and individuals’ property. This allegedly occurred as other members of the group shot fireworks at the facility itself. Ten people have been arrested for a brazen and violent attack on an ICE detention facility in Texas on July 4. (DOJ)Ten people have been arrested for a brazen and violent attack on an ICE detention facility in Texas on July 4. title: Prozess wegen Hochverrats: Erneut Haftbefehl gegen Südkoreas früheren Präsidenten Yoon
content: Der südkoreanische Ex-Präsident Yoon Suk Yeol steht wegen Hochverrats vor Gericht. Anfang des Jahres saß er bereits in Untersuchungshaft. Nun muss er erneut hinter Gitter.Gegen den ehemaligen südkoreanischen Präsidenten Yoon Suk Yeol ist erneut ein Haftbefehl erlassen worden. Ein Gericht in der Hauptstadt Seoul folgte mit der Entscheidung einem Antrag der zuständigen Sonderstaatsanwaltschaft, wie Südkoreas amtliche Nachrichtenagentur Yonhap berichtete. Die Sonderstaatsanwaltschaft argumentierte, dass Yoon möglicherweise Beweismaterial vernichten könnte. Dem 64-Jährigen wird unter anderem Hochverrat vorgeworfen. Ihm droht eine lebenslange Haftstrafe.Yoon Suk Yeol stürzte Südkorea mit Kriegsrecht in tiefe StaatskriseYoon Suk Yeol hatte als Präsident im Dezember völlig überraschend das Kriegsrecht ausgerufen und sein Land damit in eine tiefe Staatskrise gestürzt. Er begründete den radikalen Schritt auch damit, dass die linke Opposition angeblich von kommunistischen und staatsfeindlichen Kräften unterwandert sei. Beweise für diese Anschuldigungen legte er nicht vor. Mitte Januar wurde der 64-Jährige im Zuge der Staatskrise schon einmal festgenommen, Anfang März dann aber aus der Untersuchungshaft entlassen. Im April wurde er vom Verfassungsgericht des Amtes enthoben. Anfang Juni gewann der linke Politiker Lee Jae Myung die vorgezogene Präsidentenwahl. Yoon ließ über seine Anwälte sämtlich Vorwürfe abstreiten. Am frühen Donnerstagmorgen Ortszeit wurde er...

title: Unfälle: Auto überschlägt sich - vier Verletzte bei Unfall bei Adenau
content: In einer Kurve kommt das Auto von der Straße ab und überschlägt sich. Für die Insassen hat das Folgen.Bei einem Unfall auf einer Landstraße bei Adenau (Landkreis Ahrweiler) sind vier Menschen verletzt worden. Ein Auto sei am späten Abend auf der L10 zwischen Adenau und der Hohen Acht in einer Kurve von der Fahrbahn abgekommen und habe sich überschlagen, teilte die Polizei mit. Demnach wurden alle vier Insassen verletzt. Sie seien mit Rettungshubschrauber und Rettungswagen in Krankenhäuser gebracht worden.

title: Freizeit: Wissen über Wölfe - Wildpark lädt zum Aktionstag in Hanau
content: Beim "Tag des Wolfes" wollen Experten mit Vorurteilen aufräumen und zeigen, wie etwa Schafherden geschützt werden können.Mit einem "Tag des Wolfes" will der Wildpark Alte Fasanerie in Hanau an diesem Samstag großen und kleinen Besuchern Wissen über das Raubtier vermitteln und dabei auch mit Vorurteilen aufräumen. Bei einer Fütterung wird Wildbiologin Marion Ebel die einzelnen Wölfe des Parks vorstellen. Ein Schäfer soll zeigen, wie Herden vor Wolfsangriffen geschützt werden können. Geplant ist außerdem ein Fachvortrag."Wir wollen sachliche Informationen geben. Das ist ganz wichtig", kündigt Referent Gunter Trapp an. Er ist Wolfsbeauftragter der Main-Spessart-Region im benachbarten Bayern und Mitglied des Naturschutzbundes (Nabu). "Es geht nicht darum, irgendwelche Emotionen zu schüren.""Wölfe sind absolutes Highlight"In der Fasanerie leben zwei Rudel in getrennten Gehegen: drei Tundrawölfe und zehn Europäische Wölfe, wie Försterin und Waldpädagogin Sabine Scholl berichtet. "Die Wölfe sind ein absolutes Highlight in unserem Park und sehr beliebt bei den Besucherinnen und Besuchern." Aktionen wie der "Tag des Wolfes" seien nützlich, damit der Wildpark auch einmal eingehender auf eine bestimmte Tierart eingehen und darüber informieren könne. Die Alte Fasanerie ist mit ihren weitläufigen Wildgehegen und Wanderwegen ein Anziehungspunkt für Besucher weit über Hanau hinaus und vor allem bei Familien beliebt. Direkt am Eingang des Wildparks befindet sich...

title: EU-Projekt „Living Lahn“ wird voraussichtlich verlängert
Gewässer: EU-Projekt "Living Lahn" wird voraussichtlich verlängert
content: Ökologie, Tourismus und Schifffahrt sollen bei "Living Lahn" unter einen Hut gebracht werden. Für die Erstellung des entsprechenden Konzepts bekommen die Verantwortlichen voraussichtlich mehr Zeit.Das ursprünglich auf zehn Jahre angelegte EU-Projekt "Living Lahn" wird voraussichtlich um ein Jahr verlängert. Die EU-Kommission habe den Beteiligten die Verlängerung nahegelegt, um das Lahnkonzept als wesentlichen Baustein des Projekts gut beenden zu können, sagte der Projektleiter des hessischen Umwelt- und Landwirtschaftsministeriums, Stephan von Keitz, der Deutschen Presse-Agentur. Ein Entwurf werde voraussichtlich am 7. August vorgestellt. "Living Lahn" hat eine ökologische Aufwertung des Flusses und zugleich eine Verbesserung der Lebensqualität der Menschen in seinem Umfeld zum Ziel. Die Lahn entspringt im nordrhein-westfälischen Netphen, durchfließt Hessen und mündet bei Lahnstein in Rheinland-Pfalz in den Rhein. Zu den konkreten Maßnahmen des Pilotprojekts gehört, wieder naturnahe Ufer und Auenbereiche zu schaffen und Fischen und anderen Wasserlebewesen Wanderungen zu ermöglichen. Die Gewässergüte der Lahn soll sich verbessern, etwa durch modernere Kläranlagen, Feuchtgebiete sollen reaktiviert werden.Millionen-Förderung der EU für "Living Lahn" Das Projekt war am 1. Dezember 2015 gestartet und sollte eigentlich bis 30. November dieses Jahres laufen. Budget beläuft sich auf 15,7 Millionen Euro, davon steuert die EU rund 8,5 Millionen Euro bei. Auch durch...

title: State & Union: Bonafest set for Friday in Allegany
content: The annual Bonafest, an important fundraiser that 100% supports the operations and general finances for St. Bonaventure Parish in Allegany, is set for 4:30 to 7 p.m. Friday at the Allegany American Legion.“We are thrilled to be able to hold Bonafest again this year,” says Judy French, a Bonafest committee member.Participants can soak up the family atmosphere, sitting down and enjoying a bardbecue chicken dinner with salt potatoes, vegetable and roll while listening to music by Generations.A large raffle drawing featuring $11,000 in cash prizes will begin at 7 p.m., with ticket purchases available prior to the drawing. Additional attractions will include a bake sale and basket raffles that feature a St. Bonaventure Golf Course basket and a Buffalo Bills basket, as well as a variety of gift cards, lottery tickets and cash.The chicken dinner tickets are $15 and are pre-sale only."We invite you to come and enjoy a meal and music with us," says French. "We appreciate and thank you for your support."For more information go to EMCatholic.org.RED CROSS URGES BLOOD DONATIONSThe American Red Cross urges all donors to give blood or platelets now to keep the blood supply strong this summer. Type O blood products are most needed on hospital shelves — especially in the face of summer challenges that can quickly cause blood and platelet reserves to drop.In addition to summer fun and holidays, severe summer weather can have a sudden impact on the ability to collect blood and platelets....

title: Badeunfall: Schwimmer tot aus Dobbertiner See geborgen
content: Ein 73-jähriger Schwimmer wird an einem See vermisst. Für ihn kommt jede Hilfe zu spät.Ein 73-Jähriger ist bei einem Badeunfall im Dobbertiner See ums Leben gekommen. Der Schwimmer sei am Abend am See in der Gemeinde Dobbertin (Landkreis Ludwigslust-Parchim) als vermisst gemeldet worden, teilte die Polizei mit. Bei einer großangelegten Rettungsaktion habe man den Mann nach wenige Stunden nur noch tot aus dem Wasser bergen können. Hinweise auf eine Straftat gebe es nicht.

title: Krieg gegen die Ukraine: Russische Angriffe erschüttern erneut Kiew: Brände und Verletzte
content: Russland feuert Dutzende Kampfdrohnen sowie ballistische Raketen auf die ukrainische Hauptstadt Kiew ab. Herabstürzende Trümmer entfachten Brände.Russland hat die ukrainische Hauptstadt Kiew in der zweiten Nacht in Folge in mehreren Wellen mit Drohnen und Raketen angegriffen. Im Zentrum der Dreimillionenstadt war heftiges Flugabwehrfeuer zu hören. Bei einer Angriffswelle mit ballistischen Raketen erschütterten gut ein Dutzend Explosionen von mutmaßlichen Flugabwehrraketen die Stadt. Eines der Angriffsziele war Militärbeobachtern zufolge der Militärflughafen bei Wassylkiw südlich von Kiew.Angriffe auf Kiew: mindestens sechs Verletzte Behördenangaben nach lösten herabstürzende Drohnentrümmer in mehreren Stadtteilen Brände aus. Mindestens sechs Menschen wurden verletzt. Die ukrainische Luftwaffe hatte vor dem Anflug der Raketen und Dutzenden Kampfdrohnen gewarnt. In mehr als der Hälfte des Landes war Luftalarm ausgelöst worden. Die Ukraine wehrt sich seit mehr als drei Jahren gegen eine russische Invasion und drängt wegen intensiver werdender russischer Angriffe auf eine Verstärkung der Flugabwehr durch die westlichen Verbündeten.Hinweis: Dieser Artikel wurde aktualisiert und um weitere Informationen ergänzt.

title: US-Beamter: Rubio und Lawrow treffen sich am Rande des Asean-Gipfels
content: US-Außenminister Marco Rubio wird am Donnerstag am Rande des Asean-Gipfels in Malaysia mit seinem russischen Amtskollegen Sergej Lawrow zusammentreffen. Die beiden Chefdiplomaten werden sich am Abend (Ortszeit) in einem Konferenzzentrum in der malaysischen Hauptstadt Kuala Lumpur treffen, wie ein hochrangiger US-Beamter am Donnerstag mitteilte. Das Treffen erfolgt einen Tag nach dem größten russischen Raketen- und Drohnenangriff auf Kiew seit Beginn des Krieges vor drei Jahren. Am Montag hatte US-Präsident Donald Trump verkündet, wieder mehr Waffen in die Ukraine zu liefern und zudem scharfe Kritik am russischen Präsidenten Wladimir Putin geübt.Rubio und Lawrow hatten sich bereits Mitte Februar in Saudi-Arabien persönlich getroffen - kurz zuvor war es zu einer Annäherung zwischen Trump und Putin gekommen. Die beiden Außenminister telefonierten zudem mehrfach.Rubio traf am frühen Donnerstagmorgen in Kuala Lumpur ein. Es ist seine erste Asienreise seit seinem Amtsantritt im Januar. Das Treffen der Außenminister der Asean-Staaten findet vor dem Hintergrund neuer Zoll-Drohungen Trumps gegen zahlreiche asiatische Länder statt.

title: Portville Heritage Day is planned for Saturday
creator: By BRIAN McCLELLAN news@oleantimesherald.com
content: PORTVILLE — The community of Portville will host its annual Heritage Day on Saturday and organizers are hopeful for a well-attended event — not least because proceeds from the day are used to help local charities."This is my third year doing this," said Michelle Platt, event organizer. "We've done pretty well over the years and been able to dole out some moneys to charities, such as Sculpting for Smiles, Colt 45, the fire department and several other entities."Platt stated that during her tenure she sometimes has a donation in mind in advance, and at other times she will set the money aside in case a need arises within the community."Families in town who have gone through a fire, a death, that kind of thing. Anybody in the surrounding area who's gone through something and needs a donation," she explained.As for why she felt the need to take up the reins of the annual festivity, Platt said, "I felt the need to bring people to Portville, see what we have going on and get to know our little town. It's a nice little town, we have a lot to offer."I just want to showcase some of what we have here."The day begins with a breakfast, 7 to 10 a.m., at the Portville Memorial Legion Post 814, 24 S. Main St.Then, from 10 a.m. to 4 p.m., in and around Pioneer Park, there will be many craft, food and other vendors; children’s games; car, motorcycle and tractor shows; a basket raffle; and a chicken barbecue hosted by the fire department.There will be a bounce house for the children,...

title: Unprecedented BYD assisted driving offer puts competition on notice
content: Former Democrat Presidents Joe Biden and Barack Obama tried their best to get Americans interested in electric vehicles by offering generous tax credits and cash to get old clunkers off the road and replace them with more energy-efficient transportation.While the $7,500 tax credit enacted under Biden is set to expire in September, the program has been relatively successful.Related: Tesla's biggest rival slashes prices but faces major pushbackU.S. automakers sold 300,000 new electric vehicles in the first quarter, an 11.4% year-over-year increase, according to data from Kelley Blue Book.But while overall EV sales are increasing, Tesla's market share is decreasing due to increased competition. Tesla sales in the U.S. peaked in spring 2023 when it sold 173,000 EVs, according to Cox Automotive data. The company sold just 128,000 in Q1 2025, a 26% decline from its peak, taking its overall U.S. market share down from 5% to 3%.(Sales differ from deliveries. Deliveries involve the physical transaction of a vehicle to its owner, while sales involve the financial transaction. Tesla delivered 336,681 vehicles in Q1 2025, a 13% year-over-year decline.)But as rough as Tesla's last few months have been in the U.S., it is facing a similar road ahead in China due to many of the same obstacles. BYD reported 11% sales growth in June.Image source: Zhang Congyu/VCG via Getty Images Tesla Full Self-Driving isn't enough to drive sales in ChinaA dramatic technological jump, government incentives...

title: Police reports 7/9/25: Olean pair face multiple charges following traffic stop
content: OLEAN — Two Olean men were arrested Friday after being spotted driving an allegedly stolen vehicle, the Cattaraugus County Sheriff's Office reported Wednesday.Anthony M. Margeson, 40, and Eric R. Smith, 35, were taken into custody at 4:02 a.m. Friday following a traffic stop on Washington Street. Margeson was allegedly operating a vehicle that was reported stolen out of the city of Jamestown.Following an investigation, drug paraphernalia was reportedly observed in plain view and K9 Lex provided a positive indication on the vehicle for the odor of narcotics. A vehicle search reportedly discovered approximately 25.9 grams of suspected methamphetamine, an unspecified quantity of suspected Oxycodone pills, multiple plastic baggies, a scale, lock picking tools, a reportedly stolen Samsung smartphone, four reportedly stolen debit cards and miscellaneous unspecified drug paraphernalia.Margeson was subsequently charged with second-degree criminal possession of a controlled substance, a class A-II felony; third-degree criminal possession of a controlled substance, a class B felony; three counts of fourth-degree criminal possession of stolen property, a class E felony; aggravated unlicensed operation of a motor vehicle, an unclassified misdemeanor; possession of burglar tools and two counts of second-degree criminal use of drug paraphernalia, class A misdemeanors.Smith was charged with three counts of fourth-degree criminal possession of stolen property, a class E felony.Margeson and...

title: Turismo e mobilità sostenibile con collegamenti marittimi veloci tra Trieste, Slovenia e Croazia
content: L'estate 2025 si preannuncia ricca di novità per chi desidera esplorare le meraviglie del Nord Adriatico, dal Golfo di Trieste alla suggestiva Istria . Grazie a nuovi e veloci collegamenti marittimi da Trieste, città come Rovigno , Parenzo , Pirano e Lussinpiccolo diventano non solo tappe di un viaggio, ma vere e proprie destinazioni da sogno, facilmente accessibili e ideali per una vacanza all'insegna della scoperta. Queste gemme del Nord Adriatico custodiscono un patrimonio inestimabile che spazia dalla storia alla natura, senza dimenticare l'eccellenza enogastronomica. Immagina di passeggiare per i centri storici in pietra che si affacciano su un mare cristallino, o di rilassarti in calette nascoste immerse nella profumata macchia mediterranea. Ogni approdo è un invito a vivere un'esperienza di viaggio lenta, autentica e sostenibile , lontano dallo stress del traffico stradale. I nuovi collegamenti via mare offrono un'alternativa comoda e piacevole per raggiungere queste località incantevoli. Che tu sia un residente in cerca di una gita fuori porta, un turista desideroso di esplorare nuove mete o un amante delle vacanze attive, avrai l'opportunità di vivere un'esperienza indimenticabile. Inoltre, il trasporto biciclette a bordo permette di esplorare le coste e l'entroterra in modo ancora più dinamico e immersivo. Preparati a scoprire la magia del Nord Adriatico, tra borghi affascinanti, paesaggi mozzafiato e sapori unici. Nuove rotte marittime per riscoprire il Nord...

title: Spokesman: Olean General Hospital, BRMC brace for cuts in healthcare funding
creator: By MARCIE SCHELLHAMMER marcie@bradfordera.com
content: A spokesman for the hospitals in Olean and Bradford, Pa., said the area's healthcare community is bracing for the full impacts of President Donald Trump's "One Big Beautiful Bill Act."With billions in cuts to Medicaid and to reimbursements through the Affordable Care Act, rural hospitals are likely to face hikes in uninsured patients who can't pay for care, said Joseph Fuglewicz, spokesman for Olean General Hospital and Bradford (Pa.) Regional Medical Center, both Kaleida Health facilities.No immediate changes are happening — but what the future holds is uncertain, he said."Kaleida Health has been and continues to evaluate the impact of the 'Big Beautiful Bill' on our operations and services," for OGH and BRMC, he said. "The proposed cuts will force Kaleida Health — along with hospitals and healthcare systems in our region, state and country — to make many hard decisions in the coming weeks, months and years."The impacts are going to be universally felt in rural areas, he said.The One Big Beautiful Bill Act, which was signed into law by President Donald Trump on Friday, includes various tax breaks, spending cuts and other Republican priorities, including new funding for national defense and deportations. Much of the funding for Trump and GOP priorities are expected to come from reducing federal spending on Medicaid.Estimates from the nonpartisan Congressional Budget Office indicate that federal Medicaid spending will be reduced by roughly $1 trillion in the coming years,...

title: “Entre copas y la siesta”: Chófer de Línea Oro se queda dormido mientras esperaba al pasaje afuera de la CAPU
content: Fue captado en completo estado etílico un chofer de la ruta Atlixco-Puebla afuera de la CAPU cuando usuarios quisieron abordarlo para llegar a Atlixco.En redes sociales se filtró un video de un chofer de la línea Oro completamente en estado etílico y durmiendo, lo que causó molestia entre los cibernautas. Únete a nuestro canal de WhatsApp para mantenerte informado al estilo de DIARIO CAMBIOLos testigos señalaron que ya había llegado así con pasaje y se intentaba formar para llevarse pasaje nuevamente hacia Atlixco cuando se quedó dormido.Al respecto ni la empresa ni a Secretaria de Movilidad y Transporte se han pronunciado al respecto.Algunos señalaron que era un video pasado pero en el pasado no se sancionó al chofer y tampoco se pronunció la empresa. Sin embargo, usuarios también señalan que no es la primera vez que esto sucede poniendo en riesgo la vida de los usuarios.The post “Entre copas y la siesta”: Chófer de Línea Oro se queda dormido mientras esperaba al pasaje afuera de la CAPU appeared first on Diario Cambio.

title: When Do ‘Big, Beautiful’ Megabill Changes Go Into Effect?
creator: Anna Helhoski
content: The GOP-led Congress is walking a political tightrope with the rollout of key provisions in Trump’s “one big, beautiful” bill, passed last week. With next year’s midterms looming, strategic timing is everything: tax breaks to households (and corporations) begin in 2025, while most sweeping social program cuts are delayed until 2028. Learn more about what’s in the budget here . Here’s a rundown of when the budget provisions that could most affect your household will begin: (Photo by Chip Somodevilla/Getty Images News via Getty Images) More From NerdWallet Anna Helhoski writes for NerdWallet. Email: anna@nerdwallet.com . Twitter: @AnnaHelhoski. The article When Do ‘Big, Beautiful’ Megabill Changes Go Into Effect? originally appeared on NerdWallet.

title: 미 국방 전 고문 "주한미군 대폭 줄여 1만 명만 둬야"
creator: 장효인
content: 콜드웰 전 미국 국방장관 수석고문(왼쪽) [연합뉴스 제공] [연합뉴스 제공] 현재 약 2만 8,500명 수준인 주한미군 중, 지상 전투 병력 대부분과 2개 전투비행대대 등을 철수하고 약 1만 명만 남겨야 한다는 주장이 미국에서 나왔습니다. 피트 헤그세스 미국 국방장관의 수석 고문을 지낸 댄 콜드웰 전 미 국방장관 수석 고문은 싱크탱크 '국방우선순위'(Defense Priorities)의 제니퍼 캐버노 선임연구원과 작성한 보고서를 현지시간 9일 공개했습니다. 저자들은 "우리는 한국에서 기지 방어와 관련되지 않은 모든 지상 전투 부대와 육군 통신, 정보, 본부 부대와 이런 부대와 관련된 지원·유지 부대 일부를 줄일 것을 권고한다"고 했습니다. 그러면서 "이는 한반도에서 순환 배치하는 전투여단(BCT)과 육군 전투항공부대를 포함한 2보병사단 대부분을 철수할 것"이라고 설명했습니다. 아울러 "추가로 미국은 주한미군 기지에 있는 전투기 비행대대 2개를 다시 미국으로 옮겨 한국에 근거지를 둔 항공력을 줄여야 한다"며 "전투기와 함께 항공 정비 및 기타 지원 부대와 인력의 약 3분의 1도 미국으로 돌려보낼 수 있다"고 덧붙였습니다. 이렇게 하면 한국에 있는 미군 전력을 50% 이상 줄여 약 1만 명의 병력과 2개의 전투기 비행대대, 지원 병력을 남기게 된다는 겁니다. 이어 결국에는 주한미군을 더 줄여 나머지 비행대대와 지상군 대부분을 철수해야 한다고 권고했습니다. 저자들은 한국이 한반도 외에 역내 다른 지역에서 분쟁이 발생할...

title: Ministro Paliza y director de CNC presentan en Barna los alcances de Meta RD 2036
creator: El Nuevo Diario
content: EL NUEVO DIARIO, SANTO DOMINGO.-En un esfuerzo por continuar socializando e integrando a los distintos sectores de la sociedad dominicana en torno a la visión-país que impulsa el Gobierno, el ministro de la Presidencia, José Ignacio Paliza, y el director ejecutivo del Consejo Nacional de Competitividad (CNC), Peter A. Prazmowski, encabezaron una jornada académica en Barna Management School para presentar los alcances del proyecto Meta RD 2036.Durante el encuentro, dirigido a egresados, docentes y directivos, los funcionarios explicaron los fundamentos estratégicos de la iniciativa que busca duplicar el Producto Interno Bruto (PIB) nacional para el año 2036, a través de una hoja de ruta basada en evidencia, planificación, innovación, sostenibilidad y colaboración multisectorial.“Meta RD 2036 representa la determinación del Estado dominicano de proyectarse hacia el futuro con objetivos claros, medibles y alcanzables, que respondan al interés de toda la población. Porque el centro de cada política pública debe ser la gente”, expresó Paliza durante su intervención.El ministro explicó que este plan no es solo una declaración de intenciones, sino un compromiso de transformación real, que requiere del talento y la participación activa de todos los sectores sociales. Enfatizó que el Gobierno trabaja para construir un Estado que no solo planifique, sino que cumpla y sirva, impulsando una gestión pública orientada a resultados, evaluación de impacto y mejora...

title: Brasil convoca por segunda vez en el día al encargado de negocios de Estados Unidos
creator: EFE
content: EL NUEVO DIARIO, BRASILIA. – Brasil convocó, por segunda vez este miércoles, al encargado de negocios de la Embajada estadounidense, después de que el presidente Donald Trump anunciara un arancel del 50 % a las importaciones brasileñas por motivos políticos y económicos, informaron a EFE fuentes diplomáticas.Esta es la segunda vez que Gabriel Escobar, jefe de la legación diplomática en ausencia de un embajador, fue convocado hoy por la Cancillería brasileña, después de tener que dar explicaciones por una nota en la que protestó por el proceso de golpismo que afronta el expresidente brasileño Jair Bolsonaro.Como en la primera ocasión, Escobar volverá a ser recibido por la secretaria para Norteamérica del Ministerio de Exteriores, Maria Luisa Escorel, según confirmaron las fuentes.Esta nueva convocatoria se produce después de que Trump anunció este miércoles un arancel del 50 % adicional a las importaciones de Brasil por motivos políticos y económicos.La medida entrará en vigor el próximo 1 de agosto, según el dirigente republicano.Trump decidió aplicar ese gravamen por «la forma en que Brasil ha tratado al expresidente Bolsonaro, procesado en la Corte Suprema por supuestamente intentar dar un golpe de Estado, tras perder las elecciones de 2022 ante el actual gobernante, Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva.«Es una vergüenza internacional. Este juicio no debería estar ocurriendo. ¡Es una caza de brujas que debe terminar INMEDIATAMENTE!», exclamó el...

[날씨] 서울 한낮 37도...서쪽 중심 극심한 폭염
creator: 노수미
content: 서쪽을 중심으로 극심한 폭염이 이어지고 있습니다. 뜨거운 동풍이 불어 들면서 오늘도 서울 등 서쪽 지역은 35도 안팎까지 오를 텐데요. 반면, 동해안 지역은 비교적 선선한 바람과 맞닿아 있어 기온이 크게 오르지 못하겠습니다. 오늘도 맑은 하늘 아래 볕이 강하겠습니다. 전국의 자외선 지수 '높음'에서 '매우 높음' 단계를 오르내릴 텐데요. 야외 활동 시 모자나 양산, 선글라스를 착용하셔야겠고요. 햇볕을 피해 그늘에 머무르셔야겠습니다. 대기가 불안정한 일부 지역은 소나기도 지나겠습니다. 오후까지 제주에, 호남과 경남은 저녁 사이 내릴 텐데요. 양은 5에서, 30mm 정도겠고요. 이때 돌풍과 벼락을 동반해 요란하겠습니다. 한편, 남해안과 제주는 강풍 예비특보가 내려져 있는데요. 특히 제주는 초속 20m 이상의 돌풍이 몰아치겠고요. 바다의 물결은 최고 3.5m까지 높게 일겠습니다. 당분간 제주 해안에서는 너울성 파도가 밀려들겠습니다. 이 시각 현재 기온도 보시면, 서울 29.4도, 대전 28도를 보이고 있고요. 한낮엔 서울 37도, 대전과 광주, 전주는 35도까지 오르겠습니다. 남은 한 주간도 푹푹 찌는 가마솥더위는 이어지겠고요. 내일부터 제주에, 다음 주엔 수도권과 영서에 비가 내릴 전망입니다. 날씨 전해드렸습니다. (조민주 기상캐스터) #기상 #날씨예보 #소나기 #온열질환 #폭염특보 #찜통더위 연합뉴스TV 기사문의 및 제보 : 카톡/라인 jebo23 노수미(luxiumei88@yna.co.kr)

title: 김수현 갤러리아포레 3채 중 1채 팔았다...시세차익 50억 원
creator: 서형석
content: 배우 김수현 3월 기자회견 고 김새론의 유족 등과 법적 공방 중인 배우 김수현이 자신이 가지고 있던 서울 성수동의 아파트, 갤러리아포레 3채 중 1채를 매각했습니다. 김수현이 2014년 30억 2천만 원에 매입한 해당 부동산은 이번 매각으로 약 11년 만에 시세차익 약 50억 원을 거둔 것으로 알려졌습니다. 지난달 말 부동산 매매 계약을 체결한 것으로 미루어 광고주로부터 거액의 손해배상을 당한 것 때문 아니냐는 추측이 나왔지만 김수현은 작년부터 매매를 계획했고 매수인도 정해진 상태였던 것으로 알려졌습니다. 김수현이 갤러리아포레에 처음 투자한 건 2013년으로 당시 40억 2천만 원을 현금으로 지불해 첫 매입을 시작했습니다. 이후 2014년 두 번째, 지난해 세 번째 갤러리아포레를 각각 30억 2천만 원, 88억 원에 매입해 총 158억4천만 원을 전액 현금으로 마련한 것으로 알려져 화제를 모으기도 했습니다. 김수현은 올해 3월 유튜브 채널 '가로세로연구소'가 고 김새론 유족과의 통화 등을 인용해 2015년 당시 15세였던 김새론과 김수현이 6년간 교제했다고 주장하면서 논란이 일었습니다. 김수현은 과거 김새론과 교제한 사실은 맞지만 성인이 된 이후였다며 반박했고, 현재 고인의 유족과 가세연 운영자 김세의 등과 법적 공방을 벌리고 있습니다. #김수현 #김새론 #갤러리아포레 연합뉴스TV 기사문의 및 제보 : 카톡/라인 jebo23 서형석(codealpha@yna.co.kr)

title: Bate de Harper y dominio de Luzardo guia a Filis al triunfo ante Gigantes
creator: Hanly Ramírez
content: EL NUEVO DIARIO, SAN FRANCISCO — Es posible que Bryce Harper está calentando motores para una gran segunda mitad con los Filis.El cañonero dio algunas señales en la victoria de Filadelfia el martes por 13-0 sobre los Gigantes en el Oracle Park, que ayudó al equipo a evitar la barrida y aliviar un poco el dolor de la derrota del martes, cuando el receptor de San Francisco, Patrick Bailey, dio un jonrón dentro del parque de oro contra el derecho Jordan Romano.Harper dio un cuadrangular hacia la banda contraria contra el veterano de los Gigantes, Justin Verlander, en el cuarto episodio para darle a los Filis la ventaja por 2-0. Fue el primer extrabases de Harper desde que regresó de la lista de lesionados el 30 de junio. Fue su primer bambinazo desde el 3 de junio.Luego Harper dio un doblete hacia la banda contraria y anotó en el sexto episodio para ampliar la ventaja a 3-0. Dio dos dobles hacia la banda contraria en un ataque de siete carreras en el octavo capítulo. Fue la primera vez desde el 10 de septiembre que Harper daba tres extrabases en un compromiso.Harper dio varios swings buenos el lunes. Ha estado contento con sus turnos últimamente, incluso si no han resultado en imparables. Pero la jornada del miércoles afirmó que todo parece marchar por el camino correcto, lo que obviamente es importante porque al conjunto de Filadelfia le hacía falta el impacto del bate de Harper y lo necesitan para seguir avanzando en la segunda mitad.La ofensiva de los Filis es...

title: A decade of missed opportunities: Texas couldn't find $1M for flood warning system near camps
creator: By RYAN J. FOLEY, CHRISTOPHER L. KELLER, SEAN MURPHY, and JIM MUSTIAN - Associated Press
content: KERRVILLE, Texas (AP) — Over the last decade, an array of Texas state and local agencies missed opportunities to fund a flood warning system intended to avert a disaster like the one that killed dozens of young campers and scores of others in Kerr County on the Fourth of July. The agencies repeatedly failed to secure roughly $1 million for a project to better protect the county’s 50,000 residents and thousands of youth campers and tourists who spend time along the Guadalupe River in an area known as “flash-flood alley.” The plan, which would have installed flood monitoring equipment near Camp Mystic, cost about as much as the county spends on courthouse security every two years, or 1.5% of its annual budget. title: 인천 구월동 빌라 화재 2시간 만에 꺼져...2명 부상

content: 인천 빌라 화재 [인천소방본부 제공. 재판매 및 DB 금지] [인천소방본부 제공. 재판매 및 DB 금지] 오늘(10일) 새벽 3시 18분쯤 인천시 남동구 구월동 지상 2층, 지하 1층짜리 빌라에서 불이 나 2시간 만에 진화됐습니다. 이 불로 빌라에 사는 40대 남성과 50대 여성이 손과 귀 등에 화상을 입어 병원으로 옮겨졌고 거주자 5명이 스스로 대피하거나 구조됐습니다. 소방 당국은 빌라 뒤편 공터에 쌓여 있던 건설자재에서 불이 시작된 것으로 추정하고 구체적인 화재 원인과 피해 규모를 조사하고 있습니다. 연합뉴스TV 기사문의 및 제보 : 카톡/라인 jebo23 임광빈(june80@yna.co.kr)

title: 클럽월드컵 결승행 PSG, 5관왕 대업 눈앞..."프랑스 팀의 역사를 만드는 중"
creator: 박지은
content: 루이스 엔리케 PSG 감독[AP/연합뉴스] 루이스 엔리케 PSG 감독[AP/연합뉴스] 지난달 유럽 챔피언스리그에서 빅이어를 들어올린 '유럽 챔피언' 프랑스 파리 생제르맹(PSG)이 스페인 거함 레알 마드리드를 상대로 4골을 몰아치며 2025 국제축구연맹 클럽 월드컵 결승에 올랐습니다. PSG는 10일(한국시간) 미국 뉴저지주 이스트 러더퍼드의 메트라이프 스타디움에서 열린 대회 준결승에서 파비안 루이스의 멀티골과 우스만 뎀벨레, 곤살루 하무스의 릴레이 골을 묶어 레알 마드리드에 4-0 완승을 거뒀습니다. 결승에 진출한 PSG는 플루미넨시(브라질)를 2-0으로 제압하고 올라온 잉글랜드의 첼시와 오는 14일 우승을 놓고 맞붙게 됐습니다. 2024-2025시즌 프랑스 리그1, 프랑스컵, 슈퍼컵을 석권한 데 이어 유럽 챔피언스리그 우승을 거머쥔 PSG는 이제 1승만 더 올리면 사상 첫 5관왕 위업을 쓰게 됩니다. 루이스 엔리케 PSG 감독은 경기 후 기자회견에서 "이제 단 한 경기만을 남겨뒀다"면서 "단순히 역사를 쓰는 것이 아니라 프랑스 팀으로서 우리가 참가한 모든 대회, 특히 챔피언스리그와 현재의 클럽월드컵까지를 제패하는 새 역사를 만드는 중"이라며 큰 의미를 부여했습니다. PSG는 전반 시작 10분도 채 지나지 않아 2골이나 넣으며 일찌감치 승기를 잡았습니다. 전반 6분 만에 파비안 루이스가 왼발 논스톱 슈팅으로 선제 득점을 올렸고, 3분 뒤에는 뎀벨레가 추가골을 뽑았습니다. 이어 전반 24분 파비안이 다시 한번 문전에서 추가골을 만들며 승부를...

title: Kondisi Bocah usai Digugat Masalah Rumah Warisan Ayah, Kakek Nenek Aslinya Malu: Mereka yang Minta
'NCT 퇴출' 태일 준강간혐의 1심 선고...검찰 '7년 구형'
creator: 이화영
content: 특수준강간 혐의를 받고 있는 그룹 NCT의 전 멤버 태일 연합뉴스 자료사진 연합뉴스 자료사진 특수준강간 혐의로 재판에 넘겨진 그룹 NCT 출신 태일에 대한 1심 선고가 오늘(10일) 나옵니다. 태일은 지난달 열린 재판에서 혐의를 모두 인정하고 "실망감을 느끼신 모든 분들에게 죄송하다"며 고개를 숙였습니다. 검찰은 혐의를 인정한 태일에 대해 징역 7년과 재판부에 아동·청소년 관련 기관 등에 10년간 취업제한 명령 등을 선고해 달라고 요청했습니다. 태일은 지난해 6월 술에 취한 여성을 공범 2명과 성폭행한 혐의로 지난 2월 재판에 넘겨졌습니다. 2016년 NCT의 유닛 NCT U로 데뷔한 태일은 지난해 8월 경찰에 처음 소환됐으며 이후 NCT에서 퇴출됐고 SM엔터테인먼트와의 전속 계약도 해지됐습니다. #태일 #성범죄 #선고 연합뉴스TV 기사문의 및 제보 : 카톡/라인 jebo23 이화영(hwa@yna.co.kr)

title: "불났다, 멍멍!"...새벽 3시 화재서 가족 구한 반려견 몽실이
creator: 정서연
content: 포메라니안(기사 내용과 직접적 관련 없음) [Pixabay] [Pixabay] 모두 잠든 새벽 시간에 한 반려견이 화재로부터 가족을 구했습니다. ‘멍멍’ 짖어 주인을 깨운 덕에 불길을 일찍 발견할 수 있었던 것입니다. 10일 창원소방본부에 따르면, 전날(9일) 오전 3시 37분쯤 경남 창원시 진해구 한 아파트 9층 집 다용도실에서 불이 났습니다. 당시 가족들은 모두 깊은 잠에 빠져 있어 자칫 큰 불로 번질 뻔한 위험한 상황이었습니다. 이때 반려견 '몽실이'(포메라니안)가 평소보다 크게 짖는 소리에 이상함을 느낀 주인은 잠에서 깼다가 다용도실 김치냉장고 쪽에서 불이 난 것을 발견하고 곧바로 가정용 소화기로 껐습니다. 반려견이 짖어 위험을 알린 덕에 불길은 더 번지지 않았고, 인명 피해도 없었습니다. 소방당국은 김치냉장고, 수납장 일부가 불에 타 약 10만 원의 재산 피해가 난 것으로 파악했습니다. 창원소방본부 관계자는 "반려견이 화재 발생을 조기에 감지해 위험을 알리고, 거주자가 신속하게 소화기를 사용한 덕분에 큰 피해를 막을 수 있었다"며 "화재 초기 대응의 중요성과 주택용 소방시설 필요성을 잘 보여주는 사례"라고 설명했습니다. #화재 #반려견 #강아지 연합뉴스TV 기사문의 및 제보 : 카톡/라인 jebo23 정서연(jswhy@yna.co.kr)

title: AP Sports SummaryBrief at 8:17 p.m. EDT
creator: AP
content: Fabián Ruiz scores 2 goals and PSG routs Real Madrid 4-0 to reach Club World Cup final EAST RUTHERFORD, N.J. (AP) — Fabián Ruiz scored twice as Paris Saint-Germain built a three-goal lead in the first 24 minutes and routed Real Madrid 4-0, advancing to the Club World Cup final against Chelsea. Ruiz scored in the sixth minute and Ousmane Dembélé in the ninth on Wednesday following glaring mistakes by defenders Raúl Asencio and Antonio Rüdiger, and Ruiz made it 3-0 to cap a counter. Gonçalo Ramos added a goal in the 87th. Coming off its first European title, PSG plays for the championship on Sunday. Zach McKinstry picked as AL All-Star sub as Tigers tie Dodgers for most picks for Midsummer Classic The Detroit Tigers now have five All-Stars, tying them with the Dodgers for the most in the majors. Zach McKinstry was added Wednesday, replacing injured Astros shortstop Jeremy Peña. McKinstry joins teammates Gleyber Torres, Javier Báez, Riley Greene, and pitcher Tarik Skubal. The Tigers, with a league-best 59-34 record as of Wednesday, have been a surprise success this season. Meanwhile, Houston’s Isaac Paredes replaces Cleveland’s José Ramírez, giving the Astros four All-Stars. Other All-Star replacements include Andrew Abbott for the Dodgers’ Yoshinobu Yamamoto and Junior Caminero for Boston’s Alex Bregman. Novak Djokovic reaches a record 14th Wimbledon semifinal and faces No. 1 Jannik Sinner next LONDON (AP) — Novak Djokovic has reached the Wimbledon semifinals for a...

title: Southern California nurse accused of unlawful sexual conduct involving incapacitated patients
creator: Vivian Chow
content: A Southern California nurse was arrested for allegedly engaging in unlawful sexual conduct with incapacitated patients under his care.Francisco Gallegos Loaiza is a licensed vocational nurse who provided in-home care to residents in the San Fernando Valley and the greater L.A. area, according to the Los Angeles Police Department.After investigating reports of unlawful sexual conduct, police identified the victims as incapacitated patients who were reportedly under Loaiza’s care.Detectives are searching for more information and additional victims who have not come forward. Francisco Gallegos Loaiza is seen in a booking photo from the Los Angeles Police Department.Anyone with information is urged to call LAPD Foothill Detectives at 818-834-3115 from 9 a.m.- 4 p.m. Outside business hours, the public can also call the LAPD at 1-877-527-3247. Anonymous tips can be provided to L.A. Regional Crime Stoppers at 1-800-222-8477 or online at lacrimestoppers.org.

title: Junior Caminero homers, scores twice to help the Rays end the Tigers' winning streak
creator: By DAVE HOGG - Associated Press
content: DETROIT (AP) — First-time All-Star Junior Caminero homered and scored twice and the Tampa Bay Rays beat Detroit 7-3 on Wednesday to end the major league-leading Tigers' winning streak at five games. Down 3-2 after five innings, the Rays scored four times in the sixth and Caminero led off the seventh with his 22nd homer — a blast over the Detroit bullpen in left. The Rays broke it open against reliever Chase Lee in the sixth. With two out and a runner on second, Lee replaced Brant Hurter (4-1) and allowed four straight run-scoring hits, including doubles by Ha-Seong Kim and Danny Jansen. The Tigers loaded the bases in the seventh, but Garrett Cleavinger struck out Riley Greene to end the inning. Zack Littell (8-7) allowed three runs in 5 2/3 innings for the Rays. The biggest cheer came after the top of the first inning when the Tigers announced that Zach McKinstry had been selected an All-Star reserve, giving Detroit five representatives. The Tigers last had six in 2013. Detroit's Gleyber Torres doubled in the fourth to extend his on-base streak to 22 games — the longest active streak in the majors. It matched his career high, done twice for the New York Yankees, most recently last August. Tampa Bay travels to Boston to start a four-game series. RHP Taj Bradley (5-6. 4.79) was scheduled to start Thursday against Boston's RHP Walker Buehler. The Tigers are off Thursday before starting a home series with Seattle on Friday. LHP Tarik Skubal (10-2, 2.02) was set to pitch the...

title: Athletics Jacob Wilson's hand injury less severe than feared, All-Star Game status uncertain
creator: By MARK ANDERSON - AP Sports Writer
content: WEST SACRAMENTO, Calif. (AP) — The news on Athletics shortstop Jacob Wilson's injured left hand was much better than feared, however his status for Tuesday's All-Star Game is uncertain. “That's the question I can't answer right now,” manager Mark Kotsay said before Wednesday's game against the Atlanta Braves. “Its day to day. We hope to get him back before that. Today's a day where there's soreness. The positive is that he can put a bat in his hand.” Wilson, the first fan-elected rookie starting All-Star shortstop, was hit on the hand in the first inning of Tuesday night's 10-1 victory over the Braves . X-rays were negative for a broken bone, so the A's were relieved that Wilson shouldn't be out of the lineup long. He is batting .335 with nine home runs and 42 RBIs. “I think we escaped with Jacob yesterday,” Kotsay said. "Any time someone takes one in the hand, it could've been worse." Wilson, selected sixth in the 2023 amateur draft, was the leading candidate for AL Rookie of the Year, according to BetMGM Sportsbook, before the injury. Now he's second, one spot ahead of teammate Nick Kurtz. “It's a big sigh of relief for sure,” Wilson said after the game. “The anxiety of waiting the 15, 20 minutes after it happened. Nothing was broken. It could've been a lot worse, so everything's good." Also, A's utility player Miguel Andujar was removed from the 10-day injured list, and outfielder Colby Thomas was sent to Triple-A Las Vegas. Andujar was hitting .296 with three homers and...

title: AP Entertainment SummaryBrief at 8:16 p.m. EDT
creator: AP
content: 'Superman' brings a message of hope to a cynical world LOS ANGELES (AP) — Superman might do more than just save Metropolis. Filmmaker James Gunn hopes the beloved superhero will bring hope to a cynical world. “Superman,” which flies into theaters nationwide Thursday, is a bit of a change in tone for the writer and director who brought a mischievous playfulness and snark to the chaotic worlds of “Suicide Squad” and the “Guardians of the Galaxy." The film is threaded with optimism and what it means to be inherently good as audiences watch the metahuman save the day. Gunn doesn’t just focus on Superman’s humanity but highlights the importance of truth and the power of journalism to fight against injustice. Burna Boy's 'No Sign of Weakness' fulfills his rock star dreams NEW YORK (AP) — Afrobeats megastar Burna Boy is releasing his new album, “No Sign of Weakness,” on Friday. The Grammy-winning artist is bringing his own rock star dreams to life with features from Rolling Stones frontman Mick Jagger, country hitmaker Shaboozey and hip-hop heavyweight Travis Scott on the 16-track album. Fresh off becoming the first African artist to sell out Paris’ iconic Stade de France in April and recognized as one of the standard-bearers of the genre, the “Last Last” artist launched his world tour this week with North American dates beginning in November. It will feature a unique circular stage, providing a chance for fans to equally enjoy the musical experience. Embeth Davidtz drew on her...

title: Yankees cut 2-time batting champ DJ LeMahieu with nearly $22 million left on contract
creator: By MIKE FITZPATRICK - AP Baseball Writer
content: NEW YORK (AP) — DJ LeMahieu was cut Wednesday by the New York Yankees with almost $22 million remaining on his contract, one day after the two-time batting champion got demoted to the bench. “It's been a tough couple days. Some hard conversations," manager Aaron Boone said before New York's game against the Seattle Mariners. "But in the end, feel like this is the right thing to do at this time." LeMahieu, who turns 37 on Sunday, was designated for assignment and fellow infielder Jorbit Vivas was recalled from Triple-A Scranton/Wilkes-Barre. New York has seven days to trade or release LeMahieu, or send him outright to the minors — an assignment he would have the right to refuse in favor of free agency. It's very unlikely another team would claim LeMahieu off waivers because he's still owed $21,612,903 from the $90 million, six-year deal he signed with the Yankees prior to the 2021 season. New York must pay him $6,612,903 for the rest of this season and $15 million in 2026. “Tough decisions," general manager Brian Cashman said. "It ultimately comes down to how this roster sits and what’s best. You want to provide your manager with enough chess moves.” LeMahieu, a three-time All-Star, was batting .266 with two homers, 12 RBIs and a .674 OPS. He made his season debut May 13 after recovering from a left calf strain and had a .310 average in his last 31 games since June 1. A versatile defender in the past, LeMahieu has made all 35 of his starts at second base this year — even...

title: Stakeholders seek united front for sustainable industrialisation
creator: Rapheal
content: By Merit Ibe Stakeholders in the sustainability and environmental, social and governance (ESG) sector have highlighted the importance of ESG-aligned infrastructure and stakeholder collaboration to achieve climate-smart industrial development in Africa.In the face of accelerating climate risk, evolving financial priorities, and a generational shift toward values-driven leadership, they called for action between the government and private sector that would serve as a blueprint for inclusive growth, corporate accountability, responsible governance and long-term resilience in the face of economic uncertainty. googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('div-gpt-ad-1718806029429-0'); }); This requires informed leadership and innovative solutions amongst top professionals, policymakers and thought leaders. title: Sky Carp get series with Dayton Dragons back to even with 5-1 victory
creator: JIM FRANZ Sports Editor
content: BELOIT — Second baseman Gage Miller set the tone for the Beloit Sky Carp in the first inning Wednesday afternoon when he delivered a bases-clearing two-out double at ABC Supply Stadium. Then he made certain he left a lasting impression in the ninth inning by ranging into the outfield grass to pounce on a hard hit ground ball by Johnny Ascanio and throwing on the run in time to retire the Dayton Dragon as the Sky Carp took the second game of the six-game homestand 5-1. “That play is just instinct,” said Miller, who had six assists in the game. “You see the ball and go get it and just fire a throw.” In the first inning, Miller stepped to the plate after Colby Shade had led off with a single and stole second and third before Garret Forrester and Eric Rataczak walked with two outs. Dayton replaced starter Luke Hayden (1-5) after just 29 pitches, bringing on reliever Graham Osman. “I was just looking to hit the ball hard somewhere and hopefully find a gap,” Miller said about his three-run double to center. “I was hoping for a fastball and that’s what I got.” That key hit gave Beloit starter and winner Will Schomberg (2-4) a nice 3-0 cushion. He was sharp from the opening pitch, taking a no-hitter into the fifth inning and then retiring the first two Dragons. Ascanio did coax a walk and Ariel Almonte collected Dayton’s first hit to send Ascanio to third. Diego Omana walked to load the bases and Schomberg lost his shutout when he drilled Victor Acosta with a pitch to force in a...

title: Nestlé, FG push for improved water standards
creator: Rapheal
content: By Merit Ibe As part of ongoing efforts to ensure safer water for all Nigerians, Nestlé Nigeria is partnering with the Federal Ministry of Water Resources and Sanitation to launch a National Water Quality Advocacy Campaign. googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('div-gpt-ad-1718806029429-0'); }); The collaboration, announced in Abuja during a courtesy visit by Nestlé and members of the Organized Private Sector in Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (OPS-WASH), is aimed at raising awareness, educating communities, and mobilizing multi-stakeholder action around water safety and sustainable water practices.It reinforces government’s commitment to advancing President Bola Ahmed Tinubu’s Renewed Hope Agenda through improved access to clean water and sanitation.At the meeting, the Minister of Water Resources and Sanitation, Engr. Prof. Joseph Terlumun Utsev, welcomed the partnership, noting its importance in tackling persistent public health threats such as cholera and diarrhea while also addressing challenges related to flooding and climate resilience. $(document).ready(function(){(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({})}); He assured the Ministry’s full support for Nestlé’s campaign and pledged timely collaboration to deliver impactful results. “The Ministry is committed to working with Nestlé Nigeria to improve water quality across the country. This partnership is in line with our mission to ensure safe water access and support the health and wellbeing of all...

title: 순직해병 사건 '무죄' 박정훈 대령, 해병대 수사단장 복귀
creator: 지성림
content: 박정훈 대령 (서울=연합뉴스) 서대연 기자 = 해병대 채모 상병 순직 사건과 관련해 1심에서 무죄를 선고받은 박정훈 전 해병대 수사단장(대령)이 16일 서울 서초구 서울고등법원에서 열린 2심 준비공판에 출석하기 전 기자회견을 열고 있다. 2025.5.16 dwise@yna.co.kr (서울=연합뉴스) 서대연 기자 = 해병대 채모 상병 순직 사건과 관련해 1심에서 무죄를 선고받은 박정훈 전 해병대 수사단장(대령)이 16일 서울 서초구 서울고등법원에서 열린 2심 준비공판에 출석하기 전 기자회견을 열고 있다. 2025.5.16 dwise@yna.co.kr 순직 해병 특검의 항소 취하로 무죄가 확정된 박정훈 전 해병대 수사단장(대령)이 직무에 복귀합니다. 해병대는 오늘(10일) "박정훈 대령을 7월 11일부로 해병대 수사단장으로 재보직할 예정"이라고 밝혔습니다. 박 대령은 2023년 7월 발생한 채상병 순직 사건 초동 조사를 지휘했습니다. 임성근 전 해병대 1사단장 등 8명을 업무상 과실치사 혐의자로 특정한 초동 조사 결과에 대해 군 수뇌부가 이첩 보류 지시를 내리자, 이를 '수사 외압'이라 판단하고 경찰 이첩을 강행했다가 항명 혐의로 기소됐습니다. 박 대령은 2023년 10월 군검찰에 기소된 뒤 약 1년 9개월 만에 무죄가 확정됐습니다. 올해 1월 군사법원 1심에서 무죄를 선고받은 뒤 지난 3월 해병대 인사근무차장에 보임됐습니다. #박정훈 #해병대_수사단장 #순직해병_사건 #수사외압 #무죄 #직무복귀 연합뉴스TV 기사문의 및 제보 : 카톡/라인 jebo23...

title: Hari Ini KPK Periksa Khofifah di Jatim Bukan di Jakarta, Setyo Budiyanto Sebut Tak Ada yang Istimewa
content: - Penyidik Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi (KPK) menjadwalkan pemeriksaan terhadap Gubernur Jawa Timur (Jatim) pada hari ini. Khofifah sedianya akan diperiksa sebagai saksi terkait kasus dugaan suap pengelolaan dana hibah untuk kelompok masyarakat (pokmas) dari Anggaran Pendapatan dan Belanja Daerah (APBD) Provinsi Jawa Timur tahun 2019–2022. Penyidik berencana memeriksa di Jatim, bukan di Gedung Merah Putih, kantor di Jakarta. Menurut Ketua , lembaganya tidak mengistimewakan , sehingga penyidik memeriksa politikus Partai Kebangkitan Bangsa (PKB) itu di Jatim. Kata Setyo, pemeriksaan terhadap dilakukan di Jatim sebab pada saat bersamaan ada kegiatan penyidik juga di Jatim. "Tidak ada yang istimewa. Pemeriksaan dilakukan bersamaan kegiatan penyidik di wilayah Jatim," kata Setyo kepada wartawan, Kamis (10/7/2025). Khofifah Indar Parawansa sebelumnya dipanggil penyidik ke Gedung Merah Putih pada Jumat (20/6/2025). Namun, tidak memenuhi panggilan penyidik dan meminta penjadwalan ulang. Diberitakan sebelumnya, KPK membuka peluang untuk memanggil dan memeriksa Gubernur Jawa Timur Khofifah Indar Parawansa dalam penyidikan kasus dugaan suap pengelolaan dana hibah untuk kelompok masyarakat dari APBD Provinsi Jawa Timur tahun 2019–2022. Hal itu menyusul pengakuan dari mantan Ketua Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat Daerah (DPRD) Jawa Timur Kusnadi yang diperiksa pada Kamis (19/6/2025). Kusnadi sebelumnya menyebut bahwa yang mengeluarkan persetujuan atas dana hibah untuk pokmas. "Setiap informasi...

title: New wine launched to boost local market
creator: Rapheal
content: By Merit Ibe TradeDepot, a B2B distribution and data-driven consumer goods company, in partnership with Italian winery Bosio Family Estates, has established the Amabile di Rosa in Nigeria to address the demand for sweet wine. googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('div-gpt-ad-1718806029429-0'); }); The Chief Executive Officer of TradeDepot, Onyekachi Izukanne, said the launch aims to deepen wine culture in Nigeria by fostering domestic grape cultivation while expanding the footprint of Amabile tailored to Nigerian tastes.The company also sees a significant opportunity in the younger consumers, estimating a $420 million market. While the immediate focus is on the Nigerian market, Izukanne said TradeDepot’s long-term vision aims to meet domestic demand and also position Nigerian-made wines for export across West Africa, further boosting the nation’s economy and creating a new avenue for regional trade. $(document).ready(function(){(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({})}); “TradeDepot seeks to not only reduce Nigeria’s reliance on imported wines but also create significant job opportunities for young people and stimulate economic growth.” According to him, the company also plans to explore the use of local fruits such as mangoes to manufacture high-quality, tasty wines, further diversifying the domestic production base.He explained that TradeDepot’s foray into wine distribution comes on the heels of their data-driven insights.Using data insights,he...

title: X3M Ideas seals deal with IKIGAI 360
creator: Rapheal
content: By Merit Ibe X3M Ideas, a pan-African marketing communications agency, has announced a strategic partnership with IKIGAI 360, a creative agency with established operations in Mozambique and presence in Portugal. googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('div-gpt-ad-1718806029429-0'); }); The alliance signals a concerted move to deepen service capabilities across the African continent and into key European markets, aiming to enhance cultural intelligence, creative output, and market penetration for a growing roster of international clients.The move comes as global advertising and marketing firms increasingly seek to expand their reach into emerging markets and diversify their cultural competencies. For X3M Ideas, a company ranked by the Financial Times as one of Africa’s fastest-growing companies in 2025, this partnership with Maputo and Lisbon-based IKIGAI 360 represents a significant strategic pivot into Lusophone Africa and Southern Europe, complementing its existing strongholds in Nigeria, Kenya, Ghana, Uganda, Dubai, and London. $(document).ready(function(){(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({})}); Speaking on the partnership, CEO of X3M Ideas, Steve Babaeko said this partnership is more than just business expansion; it’s a strategic alignment of vision and values,” Babaeko noted that “IKIGAI Mozambique, in particular, positions us firmly within the dynamic East African market and the wider SADC region. Our goal is to integrate international best...

title: Penemuan Mayat di Cempaka Putih Jambi, Bermula Anak Korban Curiga Ibu Tak Bisa Dihubungi
content: - Warga , Kota digegerkan dengan seorang lanjut usia (lansia) pada Rabu (9/7/2025) malam. Wanita yang diketahui bernama Aminah (65) merupakan pensiunan pegawai lapas dan tinggal sendirian di Jalan Gatot Subroto, Kelurahan , Kecamatan . Jasad Aminah pertama kali ditemukan anaknya, yang curiga sang ibu tak bisa dihubungi selama beberapa hari. Penemuan mayat ini dikonfirmasi Kapolsek , Iptu Choiril Umam. Kata dia setelah menerima laporan warga terkait temuan mayat, pihaknya dan tim inafis langsung ke lokasi. "Korban ditemukan sudah meninggal dunia dan tubuh mulai membengkak serta mengeluarkan bau tak sedap," kata Iptu Choiril. Penemuan mayat ini bermula dari kecurigaan anak korban yang khawatir karena telepon sang ibu tidak aktif selama beberapa hari. Saat didatangi ke rumah, terciumlah bau menyengat dari dalam rumah. Dengan bantuan Ketua RT, maka pintu rumah korban didibrak. Korban ditemukan tertelungkup di atas kasur di ruang tamu dalam kondisi tak bernyawa. Hasil pemeriksaan pihak kepolisian di tempat kejadian perkara (TKP) tidak ditemukan tanda-tanda kekerasan. "Korban diduga sudah meninggal dunia beberapa hari. Pihak keluarga menolak dilakukan otopsi," imbuhnya. Jenazah korban lantas diserahkan ke pihak keluarga untuk dimakamkan. (*)

title: 천해성 전 통일부 차관, 이종석 국정원장 특보로 임용
creator: 박수주
content: 천해성 전 통일부 차관 천해성 전 통일부 차관이 이종석 국가정보원장의 특보로 임명됐습니다. 천 전 차관은 이 원장 취임 이후 특보로 임명돼 현재 근무 중인 것으로 알려졌습니다. 행정고시 출신인 천 특보는 1987년 통일부에 입부해 2019년 통일부 차관을 마지막으로 30년 넘게 공직생활을 거쳤습니다. 통일부 통일정책실장, 남북회담본부 본부장, 대변인, 인도협력국장 등 요직을 거쳤고 2010년, 2018년 남북정상회담 등에도 관여했습니다. 통일부 차관이던 2018년 3월에는 대북 특사단으로 방북해 김정은 국무위원장을 직접 만나기도 했습니다. 천 전 차관은 2022년 제20대 대선 당시 이재명 후보 캠프 평화협력위원장을 맡기도 했습니다. #천해성 #이종석 #국정원 #특보 연합뉴스TV 기사문의 및 제보 : 카톡/라인 jebo23 박수주(sooju@yna.co.kr)

title: Sosok Audrey Bianca Callista Pemenang Miss Indonesia 2025, Rekam Jejaknya Curi Perhatian
content: TRIBUNJABAR.ID - Inilah sosok Audrey Bianca Callista yang resmi dinobatkan sebagai pemenang ajang bergengsi Miss Indonesia 2025 . Finalis asal Provinsi DKI Jakarta, Audrey mencuri perhatian berkat pengalamannya di dunia modeling. Audrey dinobatkan sebagai pemenang Miss Indonesia 2025 setelah mengungguli 37 finalis lainnya dari seluruh penjuru Indonesia. Prestasinya dimulai dari keberhasilan meraih jalur fast track kategori modeling, kemudian menyabet gelar Miss Royal 2025, hingga akhirnya dinobatkan sebagai juara utama. Ia juga akan mewakili Indnesia di konten Miss World 2026 mendatang. Baca juga: Viral, Potret Lita Hendratno Peserta Miss Indonesia 2018 Kini Jadi Emak-emak Berdaster, Tuai Pujian Sosok Audrey Bianca Callista Audrey lahir pada 28 Februai 2003 di Tangerang Selatan, Banten. Dengan tinggi badan 175 cm dan penampilan yang menarik, Audrey sudah lama dikenal di dunia modeling. Dilansir dari berbagai sumber, sejak usia 15 tahun, ia bergabung dengan JIM Models, kemudian pada 2020 menjadi bagian dari Kick Management, agensi yang menaungi berbagai nama besar di dunia fashion dan entertainment Indonesia. Baca juga: Sosok Adie Pria di Depok Susah Payah Beri Lukisan untuk Dedi Mulyadi, Berujung Ponselnya Raib Dicuri Wajahnya pun juga sudah tidak asing lagi di runway, ia tampak kerap tampil dalam berbagai pergelaran bergengsi, termasuk Indonesia Fashion Week. Latar Belakang Pendidikan Audrey menyelsaikan pendidikannya di St. John School, Jakarta. Selain dunia modeling,...

title: MINERD ante reclamos por falta de cupos: Ningún estudiante quedará fuera de las aulas
creator: El Nuevo Diario
content: EL NUEVO DIARIO, SANTO DOMINGO. – Ante la preocupación y las críticas que han surgido a raíz de denuncias de falta de cupos para estudiantes en centros educativos del sector público, el ministro de Educación, Luis Miguel De Camps, reafirmó que el acceso a la educación pública está garantizado para todos los estudiantes en el año escolar 2025-2026, y que las situaciones detectadas están focalizadas en zonas específicas con alta concentración demográfica, como el Gran Santo Domingo y la provincia La Altagracia.En ese sentido, De Camps respondió que ningún niño, niña ni adolescente quedará fuera del sistema educativo por falta de cupo, en cumplimiento del compromiso asumido por el presidente Luis Abinader.Explicó que el Ministerio de Educación (MINERD) trabaja en paralelo sobre dos frentes: la gestión inmediata de solicitudes actuales y la proyección territorial basada en datos poblacionales, movilidad residencial y cambios de nivel educativo.Durante su recorrido por la Regional 03 de Azua, el ministro De Camps habló ante directores regionales y distritales, representantes de la Asociación Dominicana de Profesores (ADP) , miembros de las Asociación de Padres, Madres, Tutores y Amigos de la Escuela (APMAE) y funcionarios de Infraestructura Escolar sostuvo que el Ministerio de Educación de la República Dominicana (MINERD) trabaja con planificación y respuesta inmediata para garantizar el derecho a la educación en todo el territorio...

title: 용산구 문배동 오리온 공장부지에 38층 주상복합 재개발
creator: 임광빈
content: 서울 용산 오리온 공장부지에 38층 규모 주상복합시설이 들어섭니다. 서울시는 어제(9일) 제12차 도시·건축공동위원회를 열어 '삼각지역 역세권 활성화사업' 관련 '용산구 문배동 30-10 일대 지구단위계획 결정(안)'을 수정 가결했다고 오늘 밝혔습니다. 대상지는 4·6호선 삼각지역 환승역세권으로 용산 광역중심에 있으며 현재는 오리온 공장부지로 사용되고 있습니다. 지하 5층∼지상 38층 규모의 오피스텔(212실), 공동주택(156세대), 오피스, 근린생활시설, 공공체육시설 등 복합시설이 들어섭니다. 삼각지 고가차도와 연계한 공중보행데크를 만들어 삼각지역에서 고가를 이용해 철도 상부를 횡단하는 보행자들이 엘리베이터나 에스컬레이터를 통해 이동할 수 있게 보행환경을 개선합니다. 향후 건축위원회 심의 등 인허가 절차를 거쳐 내년 하반기 착공 예정이며, 2029년 준공이 목표입니다. 용산구 문배동 30-10 일대 개발 예상 조감도 [서울시 제공. 재판매 및 DB 금지] [서울시 제공. 재판매 및 DB 금지] 위원회에서는 '둔촌동역 주변 지구단위계획구역 및 계획 결정(변경)(안)'도 수정 가결됐습니다. 대상지는 지하철 5호선 둔촌동역 일대로, 올림픽파크포레온 입주가 완료됨에 따라 유동 인구 증가 등 지역 여건이 변화하는 곳입니다. 양재대로변의 계획적 관리를 위해 지구단위계획구역을 북측으로 약 10만m2 확대하고 업무·의료시설 등 주민생활지원기능을 권장(특화)용도로 유도했습니다. 최대 개발규모의 폐지와 업무시설의...

title: 트럼프, 영어 국가 라이베리아 대통령에 "영어 잘한다, 어디서 배웠나"
creator: 이준흠
content: 9일 트럼프 대통령, 아프리카 정상들 오찬 [AFP=연합뉴스 자료사진] [AFP=연합뉴스 자료사진] 도널드 트럼프 미국 대통령이 현지시간 9일 열린 아프리카 정상들과의 오찬 회동에서 조셉 보아카이 라이베리아 대통령을 향해 영어 실력이 뛰어나다고 칭찬해 논란이 일고 있습니다. 라이베리아의 공식 언어는 영어입니다. CNN 등 외신에 따르면, 트럼프 대통령은 보아카이 대통령이 발언을 마치자, "영어를 정말 잘한다. 어디서 그렇게 아름답게 말하는 법을 배웠나"고 물었습니다. 이어 "정말 흥미롭다. 이 테이블에 있는 사람들 중에 그렇게 잘 말하는 사람들은 없다"고 말했습니다. 라이베리아는 미국에서 해방된 흑인 노예들이 건국한 나라로, 영어가 공식 언어입니다. 보아카이 대통령은 미국 캔자스 주립대학에서 경영학 석사 과정을 밟기도 했습니다. 라이베리아 청년 활동가 아치 타멜 해리스는 CNN에 "이 말이 칭찬으로 느껴지지 않는다"며 "미국 대통령을 비롯해 많은 서방인들이, 아직도 아프리카인들을 교육받지 못한 존재로 보는 것 같다"고 지적했습니다. 익명을 요청한 한 라이베리아 외교관도 "적절하지 않은 발언이었다"며 "영어권 아프리카 국가 대통령 입장에서는 약간 깔보는 듯한 태도로 느껴진다"고 덧붙였습니다. 남아프리카 정치인 베로니카 멘테는 X(구 트위터)에 "보아카이가 왜 일어나서 떠나지 않았을까?"라고 의문을 제기하기도 했습니다. 이에 대해 라이베리아 외교장관 사라 베이솔로우 냐티는 CNN에 "트럼프 대통령은 우리가 사용하는...

title: Juegos SD 2026 tendrán policlínico de vanguardia en la Villa Centroamericana
creator: El Nuevo Diario
content: EL NUEVO DIARIO, SANTO DOMINGO.- La salud del atleta será prioridad en los Juegos Centroamericanos y del Caribe Santo Domingo 2026.El comité organizador del evento puso en marcha un moderno policlínico que funcionará dentro de la Villa Deportiva Centroamericana, actualmente en construcción en la Ciudad Juan Bosch, Santo Domingo Este.El Policlínico Santo Domingo 2026 se convertirá en el centro neurálgico de la atención médica durante los Juegos, con un diseño modular, ambientalmente responsable y con altos estándares de eficiencia energética.La instalación ocupará 450 metros cuadrados y estará alineada con las exigencias de la Comisión Médica del Comité Olímpico Internacional (COI) y de Centro Caribe Sports.El centro médico ofrecerá servicios integrales a más de 6,000 atletas y delegados que se alojarán en la villa. Su estructura incluye una sala de emergencias, tres consultorios para diversas especialidades médicas, un área exclusiva para la salud integral de la mujer atleta, farmacia, espacio de rehabilitación deportiva con 14 cubículos y una zona de crioterapia.Además, contará con dos salas de control antidopaje y dos unidades móviles de odontología, diseñadas para ofrecer respuesta rápida ante cualquier urgencia bucal durante el evento.Como respaldo hospitalario, el policlínico tendrá el soporte directo del Hospital de la Ciudad Juan Bosch y, en casos especiales, del Hospital Militar Docente FARD, Dr. Ramón de Lara, ambos ubicados a...

title: California bishop suspends Mass obligation due to immigration fears
creator: By DEEPA BHARATH - Associated Press
content: LOS ANGELES (AP) — San Bernardino Bishop Alberto Rojas, who leads more than 1.5 million Catholics in Southern California, has formally excused parishioners from their weekly obligation to attend Mass following immigration detentions on two parish properties in the diocese. The dispensation is a move usually reserved for extenuating circumstances, like the height of the COVID-19 pandemic . But Rojas says it's necessary because the fear of being apprehended and possibly deported has swept communities, including Catholic churches. “There is a real fear gripping many in our parish communities that if they venture out into any kind of public setting they will be arrested by immigration officers," Rojas said in a statement Wednesday. “Sadly, that includes attending Mass. The recent apprehension of individuals at two of our Catholic parishes has only intensified that fear. I want our immigrant communities to know that their Church stands with them and walks with them through this trying time.” Save for a serious reason, Catholics are obligated by their faith to attend Mass on Sundays and holy days of obligation. In May, the Diocese of Nashville in Tennessee issued a similar statement following immigration enforcement actions in the area, excusing those fearful of attending Mass from their holy obligation, though it was not named as a formal dispensation. Rojas is an immigrant himself. He was born and raised in Aguascalientes, Mexico. He has been consistent in his support of...

title: A good shower is a simple shower, no matter what influencers recommend
creator: By KENYA HUNTER - AP Health Writer
content: You may be seeing elaborate shower cleansing routines on social media: daily exfoliation, double cleansing, antibacterial soap, loads of scented body scrubs and shower oils. “I’m kind of appalled by the shower routines,” said Dr. Olga Bunimovich, who teaches dermatology at the University of Pittsburgh. The multistep processes that have inspired people to spend endless amounts of time sudsing up can harm your skin — and the environment . Dermatologists say it's all mostly unnecessary. “Your skin is a barrier,” said Dr. Nicole Negbenebor, a dermatologic surgeon at University of Iowa Health Care. “It’s one of the biggest barriers you have. It’s you in your natural elements. So you want to treat it right, and then sometimes there can be too much of a good thing.” Here's what to know about how to take a basic shower and indicators that you've gone too far with your routine. The basics of showering A shower is a relatively simple routine that usually doesn't require 10 steps or a plethora of products. A daily shower with lukewarm water and a fragrance-free hypoallergenic cleanser — followed by hydrating lotion or oil afterward — will do the trick. Don't plan to stay in the shower too long or turn the water temperature too high — it can strip your skin of the natural oils it needs to maintain its barrier, leaving it vulnerable to dryness and irritation. When it comes to soaps, use one meant for sensitive skin. Antibacterial soaps are popular, but experts said they dry out your skin...

content: 이재명 대통령이 지난 8일 용산 대통령실에서 국무회의를 주재하는 모습. [대통령실통신사진기자단] 이재명 대통령이 지난 8일 용산 대통령실에서 국무회의를 주재하는 모습. [대통령실통신사진기자단] 이재명 대통령이 오늘(10일) 취임 후 첫 국가안전보장회의, NSC 전체회의를 주재합니다. 이 대통령은 오늘 오후 첫 NSC 전체회의에서 하반기 안보 분야 관련 업무보고를 받을 예정이라고 대통령실이 밝혔습니다. 새 정부 출범 이후 처음으로 열리는 NSC 전체회의에서 이 대통령은 국내외 안보 정세를 점검하며 빈틈 없는 현안 대응을 주문할 것으로 보입니다. 또 미국과의 관세·안보 협상에 관한 대응 논의가 있을 가능성도 제기됩니다. #NSC #대통령 #전체회의 연합뉴스TV 기사문의 및 제보 : 카톡/라인 jebo23 장윤희(ego@yna.co.kr)

title: El PSG desnuda al Real Madrid para avanzar a la final del Mundial de Clubes
creator: EFE
content: EL NUEVO DIARIO, NEW JERSEY.- El Paris Saint-Germain trituró este miércoles por 4-0 al Real Madrid y se clasificó para la final del Mundial de Clubes de la FIFA, en el que se jugará el título frente al Chelsea.Dos errores catastróficos de Raúl Asencio y Antonio Rudiger permitieron que el PSG se colocara con 2-0 en solo nueve minutos gracias a los goles de Fabián Ruiz y Ousmane Dembélé. El centrocampista español completó su doblete en el 24 tras una fabulosa jugada colectiva del conjunto francés. El cuarto llegó en el 87 por cortesía de Gonçalo Ramos.Tras su triplete de Liga de Campeones, Ligue 1 y Copa de Francia, los de Luis Enrique tendrán la posibilidad de conquistar este domingo un nuevo título ante un Chelsea que derrotó al Fluminense en su semifinal por 0-2.Los de Xabi Alonso pusieron un broche amargo a un Mundial de brotes verdes, señales positivas y primeros rasgos de reconstrucción. La derrota ante el PSG era algo probable, pero la forma de perder resultó demasiado dolorosa y bochornosa. Además este encuentro supuso la despedida de Luka Modric y Lucas Vázquez.Alonso apostó por un 4-3-3 tras la baja a última hora de Trent Alexander-Arnold por molestias musculares. Fede Valverde ocupó su lugar en el lateral derecho. La gran noticia fue la primera titularidad en el torneo de Kylian Mbappé, en su primer reencuentro ante el PSG, y que no saliera del once Gonzalo García. Ambos compartieron delantera con Vinícius Jr.El PSG disfrutó también...

title: Gov warns of possible education funding cuts
content: Idaho Gov. Brad Little’s office last month told state agency directors to make internal plans for budget “holdbacks,” midyear cuts in spending. Little also placed limits on budget requests. The two directives come as state revenue lags behind projections and major tax cuts take effect. Little’s Division of Financial Management on May 29 sent agency directors a memo outlining the governor’s expectations, as agencies prepare their budget requests ahead of next year’s legislative session. Similar guidance memos are issued around this time every year. But the state is facing “a different scenario than we have seen in the past several years,” division Administrator Lori Wolff wrote in the latest memo, which Idaho Education News obtained through a public records request. The Idaho Capital Sun has reported that state tax revenue is $141.5 million below projections, while policymakers enacted $453 million in tax cuts this year. That means the state will have less revenue than projected in fiscal year 2027 and in future years, Wolff wrote in the memo. Wolff told agency directors that budgets relying on state general fund dollars will be limited to “maintenance” spending. Directors must get prior approval from the governor’s office before making new spending requests that use federal or dedicated funds. She also told directors to “internally prepare” for 2%, 4% or 6% budget holdbacks “as we continue to watch economic trends at the national level.” “Although we understand that there...
