title: Aces' A'ja Wilson (wrist) questionable to play against Mystics
creator: Field Level Media
content: The Las Vegas Aces might be without A'ja Wilson for Thursday's game at the Washington Mystics because of a right wrist injury she suffered Tuesday against the New York Liberty. Wilson underwent an MRI on her wrist Wednesday morning after landing on it following a layup attempt during the 87-78 loss to the Liberty. The Aces have listed her as questionable to play against the Mystics.

title: AP News Summary at 7:35 p.m. EDT
creator: AP
content: Harrowing stories of rescue emerge from Texas floods as crews search for over 160 reported missing HUNT, Texas (AP) — Texas police described some of the harrowing rescues they conducted after flash floods engulfed camps and homes in the state's Hill Country. An officer who was trapped himself spotted dozens of people stranded on roofs and waded out to bring them to safety. That's according to a fellow officer who spoke Wednesday to a news conference. Another off-duty officer tied a garden hose around his waist so he could reach two people clinging to a tree above swirling floodwaters. More than 160 people still are believed to be missing and at least 118 have died in the floods. The floods are now the deadliest from inland flooding in the U.S. since 1976. Trump tariffs goods from Brazil at 50%, citing 'witch hunt' trial against country's former president WASHINGTON (AP) — President Donald Trump is singling out Brazil for import taxes of 50%, citing its treatment of its former president, Jair Bolsonaro. The announcement Wednesday shows that personal grudges rather than simple economics are one of the driving forces behind the U.S. leader’s use of tariffs. Bolsonaro is charged with trying to overturn his 2022 election loss. Trump has described Bolsonaro as a friend and hosted the former Brazilian president at his Mar-a-Lago resort when both were in power in 2020. Trump wrote in the letter posted on Truth Social that the trial “is a Witch Hunt that should end IMMEDIATELY!”...

title: Abbott sets special session agenda. Here’s what Texas legislators will discuss
creator: Rachel Royster - Fort Worth Star-Telegram (TNS)

title: Abbott sets special session agenda. Here’s what Texas legislators will discuss
content: Gov. Greg Abbott has added several Hill Country flooding items to the special session agenda, which begins at noon on July 21. Before the July Fourth tragedy, lawmakers were set to discuss the regulation of THC products , protections for human trafficking victims and water project incentives among other things. Now the agenda has 18 items, including four legislative items dedicated to relief funding for the Hill Country flooding, flood warning system improvements, strengthening flood emergency communications and natural disaster preparation and recovery. “We delivered on historic legislation in the 89th Regular Legislative Session that will benefit Texans for generations to come,” Abbott said in a press release. “There is more work to be done, particularly in the aftermath of the devastating floods in the Texas Hill Country. We must ensure better preparation for such events in the future.” Legislators will also discuss eliminating and replacing the STAAR test for public school students, further reductions to property taxe s , abortion restrictions, congressional redistricting and “protecting women’s privacy in sex-segregated spaces.” Bills related to a few of these items had been vetoed by the governor following the close of the 89th legislative session at the beginning of June. Before the special session agenda announcement, U.S. Rep. Craig Goldman of Fort Worth told the Star-Telegram it’s common for legislators to dissect natural disaster emergency response and draft...

title: Brent Brennan, Arizona football eager to right the ship after 'unacceptable' season
creator: Justin Spears Arizona Daily Star
content: FRISCO, Texas — When Arizona strolled into Ford Center at “The Star” for the final session of Big 12 Media Days on Wednesday, there was a different vibe — and it’s not because the conference moved media days from Las Vegas to the Dallas area. There was a different tone with the Wildcats compared to last year. Arizona is no longer the new kid on the block in the 16-team Big 12, along with Pac-12 transplants in Arizona State, Utah and Colorado. UA second-year head coach Brent Brennan and Arizona’s six player representatives — quarterback Noah Fifita, offensive lineman Rhino Tapa’atoutai, defensive end Tre Smith and defensive backs Treydan Stukes, Genesis Smith and Dalton Johnson — didn’t wear leis around their necks like last season. Instead of Arizona polos and leis created by Tetairoa McMillan’s grandmother, the UA players had a business look and donned suits. Smith called his all-black suit with Prada shoes and tie clip the “John Wick look.” Arizona quarterback Noah Fifita, right, sits with teammate defensive back Treydan Stukes during Big 12 football media days in Frisco, Texas, Wednesday, July 9, 2025. Even though the Big 12 shied away from its preseason media poll, Arizona is widely considered a bottom-half — maybe a bottom-quarter — team in the conference. Last season, Arizona was voted to finish fifth in the Big 12 and even garnered three first-place votes, after Brennan retained the nucleus of the Wildcats’ 10-win team that won the Alamo Bowl, including Fifita and...

title: Flash flooding that killed 3 leaves New Mexico village heartbroken, anxious as cleanup begins
creator: By SUSAN MONTOYA BRYAN, MORGAN LEE and ROBERTO E. ROSALES - Associated Press
content: RUIDOSO, N.M. (AP) — Broken tree limbs, twisted metal, crumpled cars and muddy debris remained Wednesday as crews worked to clear roads and culverts in the wake of a flash flood that descended upon the New Mexico mountain community of Ruidoso, killing three people and damaging dozens of homes. An intense bout of monsoon rains set the disaster in motion Tuesday. Water rushed from the surrounding mountainside, overwhelming the Rio Ruidoso and taking with it a man and two children from an RV park along the river. The bodies were found downstream during search and rescue efforts.

title: Flash flooding that killed 3 leaves New Mexico village heartbroken, anxious as cleanup begins
creator: By SUSAN MONTOYA BRYAN, MORGAN LEE and ROBERTO E. ROSALES - Associated Press
content: RUIDOSO, N.M. (AP) — Broken tree limbs, twisted metal, crumpled cars and muddy debris remained Wednesday as crews worked to clear roads and culverts in the wake of a flash flood that descended upon the New Mexico mountain community of Ruidoso, killing three people and damaging dozens of homes. An intense bout of monsoon rains set the disaster in motion Tuesday. Water rushed from the surrounding mountainside, overwhelming the Rio Ruidoso and taking with it a man and two children from an RV park along the river. The bodies were found downstream during search and rescue efforts. The children — a 4-year-old girl and a 7-year-old boy — had been camping with their parents when they were swept away. The father and mother were being treated for injuries sustained in the flooding at a hospital in Texas, according to officials at Fort Bliss, where the father is stationed. Mayor Lynn Crawford said hearts are broken over the lives lost and stomachs are in knots as residents begin to take stock of the damage. A popular summer retreat, Ruidoso is no stranger to tragedy . It has spent a year rebuilding following destructive wildfires last summer and the flooding that followed . Tuesday's rainfall was more than could be absorbed by the hillsides and canyons within the burn scar. At the Riverside RV Park, owner Barbara Arthur and her guests scrambled up a nearby slope when the river started coursing through the site Tuesday afternoon. It was the sixth time the river rose in the last several...

title: A surprise IRS move on political endorsements leaves faith leaders and legal experts divided
creator: Associated Press
content: By DEEPA BHARATH and FATIMA HUSSEINWASHINGTON (AP) — A surprise move by the IRS that would allow pastors to back political candidates from the pulpit without losing their organization’s tax-exempt status is drawing praise from conservatives and even some progressive religious groups but concern from other leaders of faith, along with tax and legal experts.Related ArticlesUS issues sanctions against UN investigator probing abuses in GazaTrump administration resumes sending some weapons to Ukraine after Pentagon pauseMan accused of Trump assassination attempt in Florida seeks to remove defense attorneys from caseRepublicans urge US universities to cut ties with Chinese-backed scholarship programNew lawsuit seeks to redraw Wisconsin’s congressional maps before 2026 midtermsA 1954 provision in the tax code called the Johnson Amendment says churches and other nonprofits could lose their tax-exempt status if they participate or intervene in any political campaign on behalf of or in opposition to any candidate for public office. The rule was rarely enforced.While the IRS did not go as far as calling for the repeal of the Johnson Amendment, it said in court documents Monday that communications in good faith by a church to its flock does not amount to “intervening” or affecting the outcome of a political campaign.“Communications from a house of worship to its congregation in connection with religious services through its usual channels of communication on matters of faith do not run...

title: Harga Emas Hari Ini Kamis 10 Juli 2025 Merosot, UBS Rp 1,883 Juta Per Gram, Galeri 24 Lebih Murah
content: - Simak berikut harga emas batangan di pada hari ini, Kamis (10/7/2025) mulai dari jenis hingga UBS. Dilansir dari laman , harga dan kompak mengalami penurunan harga. Harga emas hari ini dipatok Rp1.873.000 per gram turun Rp 13.000 dari harga sebelumnya Rp1.886.000. Kemudian harga dengan berat 1 gram hari ini dijual Rp1.883.000 turun Rp 19.000 dari harga di hari sebelumnya Rp1.902.000. Pegadaian sebenarnya juga menjual . Namun, untuk saat ini tidak ada harga yang tercantum alis gaib. Kondisi harga yang tidak tersedia di sudah terjadi sejak 25 Juni 2025. Sebagai informasi, naik atau turunnya harga emas bisa disebabkan oleh berbagai faktor, seperti kebijakan ekonomi, nilai tukar dolar AS, hingga tinggi-rendahnya peminat. Berikut Tribunjabar.id sajikan daftar harga emas Antam, Galeri 24, dan UBS hari ini Kamis (10/7/2025): Baca berita Tribun Jabar lainnya di .

title: Andrés Dilonex y Smerling Rodríguez ganan primer torneo de golf Forum Empresarial
creator: William Aish
content: EL NUEVO DIARIO, SANTO DOMINGO.- Los golfistas Andrés Dilonex y Smerling Rodríguez se coronaron campeones del primer torneo de golf Forum Empresarial, celebrado este sábado en el campo Bella Vista Bonao Golf Club, organizado por la Camara de Comercio y Producción de Monseñor Nouel.La pareja de Dilonex y Rodríguez establecieron un récord con 7 bajo par bruto, en el evento que fue celebrado en la modalidad Scramble.En el evento participaron jugadores de todo el país, en total unos 115 golfistas.Aquí los ganadoresCategoría ACampeones del torneo: Andrés Dilónex & Smerling RodríguezRafael García / Néxido GalánFederico Siri / Héctor MéndezOsvaldo Luis / Benny MartínezAntonio Núñez / Thomas KimCategoría BCarlos Rosario Díaz & Ariel RamírezJuan Severino & Esteban SeverinoEdward Herrera & Glen SantosCategoría CIsrael de León & Jorge JiménezGiordano Landrón & Alex RamírezJosé Recio & Chris PortelliBienvenido Santos & Francis SerranoEl primer torneo de golf Fórum Empresarial fue mucho más que una competencia, fue un encuentro de líderes, autoridades y apasionados del golf de toda la República Dominicana. Desde Santo Domingo hasta Punta Cana, desde La Vega hasta Puerto Plata, con Monseñor Nouel como local, se vivió una jornada histórica que unió regiones, talentos y propósitos.La entrada Andrés Dilonex y Smerling Rodríguez ganan primer torneo de golf Forum Empresarial se publicó primero en El Nuevo Diario (República Dominicana).

Bateo de Harper y el dominio del peruano Luzardo fueron clave en paliza de Filis 13-0 ante Gigantes
creator: AP
content: SAN FRANCISCO (AP) — Bryce Harper conectó un jonrón y tres dobles, el peruano Jesús Luzardo ponchó a siete y permitió tres hits en siete entradas, y los Filis de Filadelfia mantuvieron a Justin Verlander sin victorias con una paliza de 13-0 sobre los Gigantes de San Francisco el miércoles. El derecho de 42 años Verlander (0-7), equien está en su primer año con los Gigantes, permitió cuatro carreras (dos limpias) en siete imparables en labor de seis entradas. El tres veces ganador del premio Cy Young ponchó a siete y no otorgó bases por bolas. Fue su 15ta salida de la temporada y su racha más larga anterior de aperturas sin una victoria fue de siete. Los Filis anotaron una carrera sucia en la segunda antes de que Harper abriera la cuarta con su 10mo cuadrangular, castigando a Verlander por el jardín izquierdo. Harper inició la sexta con un doble, encendiendo la entrada de dos carreras de Filadelfia. Consiguió par de dobletes en la octava entrada cuando los Filis rompieron el juego con siete carreras contra el bullpen de San Francisco. El gran golpe fue un jonrón de tres carreras de Kyle Schwarber contra Scott Alexander, el 29no vuelacercas de Schwarber de la temporada. Mike Yastrzemski, normalmente un jardinero, lanzó la novena para los Gigantes. Aceptó dos carreras pero dominó a Harper con un elevado de foul para terminar la entrada. Por los Filis, el dominicano Johan Rojas bateó de 1-1 con dos carreras anotadas; y el panameño Edmundo Sosa de 1-0. Por...

title: Pengurus Sejumlah Kadin Daerah di Jabar Minta Fokus ke Muprov, Abaikan Polemik dan Maklumat Sepihak
content: Di tengah memanasnya dinamika internal Kamar Dagang dan Industri (Kadin) Jawa Barat, sejumlah pengurus Kadin daerah angkat bicara dan mengimbau agar perhatian tak terpecah oleh maklumat-maklumat sepihak yang dinilai tidak sah secara organisasi. Sorotan pun mengarah pada maklumat yang dikeluarkan oleh sekelompok orang yang mengklaim sebagai Ketua Kadin kabupaten/kota di Jawa Barat. Ketua Kadin Kota Bogor, Maryanti Dona Hasanah, menanggapi kemunculan maklumat tersebut dengan tegas. Ia mengajak para pengurus Kadin di berbagai daerah untuk tidak memberikan perhatian lebih terhadap isi maklumat yang menurutnya menyimpang dari Anggaran Dasar/Anggaran Rumah Tangga (AD/ART) maupun mekanisme resmi organisasi. Menurut Dona, saat ini sebaiknya seluruh energi diarahkan untuk mendukung langkah-langkah yang sedang ditempuh oleh selaku Ketua . "Lebih baik fokus mendukung program yang sedang dilakukan Ketua yang sedang melakukan pembenahan administrasi kadinda kota/kabupaten," ujarnya. Ia juga menyampaikan harapannya agar Musyawarah Provinsi (Muprov) segera diselenggarakan demi menentukan kepemimpinan definitif Kadin Jawa Barat. Dona menyebut, sosok yang terpilih nanti idealnya adalah figur yang punya rekam jejak mumpuni serta visi dan misi yang kuat untuk memajukan Kadin di tingkat provinsi. Dukungan terhadap sikap Dona juga disuarakan oleh Ketua Kadin Karawang, Emay Ahmad Maehi. Ia menilai bahwa isi maklumat yang dibacakan oleh sebagian pihak telah melenceng dari fakta yang sebenarnya....

title: Republicans go on the offensive in the Buffalo mayoral race
content: BUFFALO, N.Y. — The race for mayor in the City of Buffalo has now shifted over for the general election in November and the Republicans are now gearing up behind their candidate. Despite the overwhelming Democratic registration advantage, GOP leaders feel they can find city voter support over the endorsed Democratic candidate. From his primary election night win , the Democratic candidate for mayor is already drawing the "socialist" label from Republicans who also sought to connect him with the other Democratic primary winner for mayor in New York City. At the same time their GOP candidate, James Gardner, on Wednesday sought to boost his chances despite a certain reality as he told reporters: "By party registration there's no doubt about it that Buffalo is a Democratic city. But if you look at the values that Buffalonians have, those aren't the values of the Democratic Party of Erie County, and certainly not the Democratic Party of New York State." Gardner added: "What people want is common sense. They don't want ideological talking points. They don't want spoon-fed socialism." The campaign of Democratic candidate Sean Ryan responded that the Republican slings at him were "laughable" and a "scare tactic." That is even as Ryan's campaign during the primary used divisive GOP figure and developer Carl Paladino with their own linkage strategy against another opponent as Paladino's son William got involved as a fundraiser. Ryan spoke to 2 On Your Side Wednesday as he still...

title: Zach McKinstry elegido como suplente en Juego de Estrellas; Tigres igualan a Dodgers en selecciones
creator: Por DAVE SKRETTA - Associated Press
content: Los Tigres de Detroit ostentan la foja más destacada en las mayores. Ahora también están empatados con la mayor cantidad de jugadores en el Juego de Estrellas. Zach McKinstry fue seleccionado el miércoles para reemplazar al campocorto dominicano de los Astros, Jeremy Peña, quien ha estado lidiando con una lesión en las costillas. El jugador de cuadro y jardinero se une así a otros Tigres elegidos: el segunda base venezolano Gleyber Torres, el jardinero boricua Javier Báez y el guardabosque Riley Greene —todos titulares de la Liga Americana—, así como al as del cuerpo de lanzadores, Tarik Skubal, quien también está entre los candidatos para abrir el Juego de Estrellas el martes por la noche en Atlanta. Mientras tanto, el antesalista mexicano de Houston, Isaac Paredes, fue elegido el miércoles para reemplazar al pelotero dominicano de los Guardianes, José Ramírez, quien había sido el tercera base titular. Eso le da a los Astros cuatro peloteros en el Juego de Estrellas, contando a Peña y a los lanzadores Hunter Brown y Josh Hader. Los Guardianes dijeron que Ramírez quería "enfocarse en la recuperación y preparación para la segunda mitad de la temporada". El cerrador de Milwaukee, Trevor Megill, también fue añadido al equipo de la Liga Nacional del Juego de Estrellas el miércoles, poco después de ponchar a Freddie Freeman, al cubano Andy Pages y a Tommy Edman en orden en la décima entrada para que los Cerveceros triunfaran por 3-2 sobre los Dodgers de...

title: ‘Jeopardy!’: Returning Champ Faces Regional Rivals in East Coast Showdown
creator: Erin Maxwell, TV Insider
content: [Warning: The below contains MAJOR spoilers for the Wednesday, July 9, episode of Jeopardy! ] Two would-be winners from the Big Apple decided it was time to take a swing at the boy from the Garden State, as Rahul Kak, a law student from Brooklyn, and Sarah Mulligan, a lawyer from New York, faced off against returning Jeopardy! champ Scott Riccardi, whose four-day cash winnings totaled an impressive $132,402. Host Ken Jennings recapped yesterday’s thrilling game, when Riccardi was given a run for his money by Scott Puma, who racked up 23 correct responses to Riccardi’s 24. If Riccardi wins today, it will mark his fifth consecutive victory and earn him a spot in the Tournament of Champions. Right off the bat, Riccardi found the Daily Double, hidden under “American History” for $600. With no money yet in his bank, he wagered the maximum allowed of $1,000 on the clue: “Around 1870, unbranded strays gained this moniker from the name of a Texas rancher negligent in marking his calves.” Riccardi incorrectly answered, “What is a mustang?” starting him off on the wrong foot with -$1,000. The correct response was, “What is a maverick?” Riccardi got out of the red with the “American History” clue: “In 1865, Mary Surratt was executed by the U.S. government; in 1953, she became the next woman to suffer that fate.” His correct response, “Who is Ethel Rosenberg?” brought him back to $0. By the time the game went to a commercial break, it was a close match as Riccardi and Mulligan were tied...

title: You can now buy an Ineos Grenadier with portal axles (in Europe, at least)
State proposes keeping marbled murrelet on endangered list
creator: EMMA FLETCHER-FRAZER Skagit Valley Herald
content: The state Department of Fish and Wildlife is proposing to keep a species of small seabird on the state's endangered species list. The marbled murrelet forages on open waters throughout the Salish Sea, but nests in inland old-growth forest habitat. The loss of nesting habitat, combined with oil spills and net fisheries, has brought about a decline in population for the species, according to the department. The state listed the species as threatened in 1993, then as endangered in 2016. The species has continued to decline at a rate of about 5% per year. The species' most recent population estimates within the state have dropped from 7,500 birds in 2015 to 4,400 in 2023. The department's draft periodic status review for the species concludes that the species continues to lose habitat, and that the murrelet could disappear from regions within the state in the next several decades. The state completes draft periodic status reviews every five years to assess species’ populations, habitat trends and management activities. The listing recommendation is part of the draft periodic status review process. "Without effective action soon, Washington’s marbled murrelet population may become extinct in Washington in the coming decades," Jen Mannas, department marine species lead, said in a news release. "Continued protection and expanded conservation efforts are essential to prevent that outcome." Those interested in commenting on extending the listing can do so through email to...

title: YORK: Disturbing glimpses of Democratic anger
content: We know many Democrats were stunned when Donald Trump won a second term as president. We know many are still angry about it. But we’re just now learning how angry some of them are. It’s not just grandstanding Democratic lawmakers like Rep. Jasmine Crockett of Texas. Axios reports that “at town halls in their districts and in one-on-one meetings with constituents and activists,” Crockett’s more moderate Democratic House colleagues are “facing a growing thrum of demands to break the rules, fight dirty – and not be afraid to get hurt.” “Our own base is telling us that what we’re doing is not good enough,” said one Democratic lawmaker (out of nine) quoted in the Axios article. “Some of them have suggested ... what we really need to do is be willing to get shot [in protests at U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement facilities] ... that there needs to be blood to grab the attention of the press and the public.” Another lawmaker told Axios that constituents say “civility isn’t working” and to get ready for “violence ... to fight to protect our democracy.” And another said, “It’s like ... the Roman Coliseum. People just want more and more of this spectacle.” Obviously, these are Democrats who have moved beyond the defeat-them-at-the-ballot-box stage of politics, and even beyond the protest-by-civil-disobedience stage. They’re ready to turn a political fight into a physical fight. Violence is already going on. In Alvarado, Texas, a militant group broadly allied with Democratic...

title: US attorney's office says Christopher Martinez entered country illegally several times
creator: SONNY TAPIA sonny.tapia@helenair.com
content: A Helena man detained by ICE on July 1 could not present a Montana driver's license to law enforcement and was deported multiple times before his latest arrest, the U.S. attorney's office said in a court filing. Christopher Martinez, 31, listed in court documents as Christopher Martinez Marvan, was detained by federal agents July 1 following a traffic stop by Helena police for expired registration near the intersection of Billings and Montana avenues. U.S. attorneys cited multiple occasions where Martinez, a Mexican national, was detained and deported out of the U.S. in its response filed July 7 to an amended petition for writ of habeas corpus filed by Upper Seven Law attorneys July 3. "For example, in 2007, the United States voluntarily returned Martinez on two occasions after he illegally entered the United States. In 2021, law enforcement arrested Martinez four times after he illegally entered the United States," the U.S. attorney's office said in court documents. Christopher Martinez pictured with a member of his family. Martinez was detained by ICE agents in Helena on July 1. The petition is scheduled to be heard Thursday in federal court in Missoula. The detainee — who lived in Helena with his wife, Maria Pacheco, a U.S. citizen, and their four children — was expelled from the country in 2021 on May 5, May 15, May 26 and June 2, according to documents. Maria Pacheco holds her son and speaks to the public about her husband's arrest by ICE agents on Tuesday, July 1, in...

title: SHPO seeks mayors' help identifying more Guam historic sites for National Register
creator: By Uriah Aguon Pacific Daily News
content: State Historic Preservation Officer Patrick Lujan on Wednesday asked mayors to help identify historically significant sites and structures in their village for possible submission to the National Register of Historic Places. Lujan also offered a tentative list to the Mayors’ Council of Guam during their regular meeting. “We’ve done a survey and we’re in the process of finishing up the island on the east side. Homes, businesses, and commercial buildings [from] 1975 are considered eligible, so think about it as you go around your villages,” Lujan told mayors and vice mayors. The nationwide statute for when a location or landmark can be submitted for national recognition is 50 years. This applies to various memorial sites and battlegrounds throughout Guam, such as Manenggon, Asan and Apra Harbor. “We are a resource for you,” Lujan said. “We have a lot of data and information for us to work together from a historical point of view or archaeological point of view to add value to your village.” Sinajana Mayor Robert Hofmann, vice president of MCOG, asked about the likelihood of other memorial sites becoming National Historical Landmarks after the Manenggon Memorial was designated one in December 2024. While Lujan’s intention is to submit as many as he can, he said it is “harder to justify a memorial than a battlefield.” However, should a memorial site be successfully added to the National Register, it will receive additional financial support for maintenance and preservation, he...

title: AANA Condemns UnitedHealthcare's Unlawful, Discriminatory Anesthesia Reimbursement Changes
creator: By American Association of Nurse Anesthesiology
content: ROSEMONT, Ill. , July 9, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- The American Association of Nurse Anesthesiology (AANA) strongly condemns UnitedHealthcare's announced changes to their anesthesia calculations, including a 15% cut in reimbursement for claims submitted for services rendered by a Certified Registered Nurse Anesthetist (CRNA) independently. "This is yet another attempt to discriminate against CRNAs by offering less compensation for their skills, expertise, and time," said AANA President Jan Setnor , MSN, CRNA, Col. (Ret), USAFR, NC. "All anesthesia providers are trained in and use the exact same techniques to administer anesthesia, yet no other providers face the same cut – UnitedHealthcare is blatantly targeting CRNAs, based on their licensure alone. This action is unlawful, unacceptable, and unconscionable, particularly as our nation continues to face a shortage of anesthesia providers." The policy is targeted specifically at anesthesia services appended with the QZ modifier, meaning CRNAs working independently and legally working to the top of their license. This is in direct conflict with the federal provider non-discrimination provision of the Affordable Care Act (ACA). AANA filed a petition for a writ of mandamus in the United States District Court for the Northern District of Ohio asking the court to compel the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) Secretary to enforce the provision against insurance companies and health plans. This is a duty that the secretary is...

title: Fire evacuations extended up to Bald Ridge Road in Lincoln County
creator: nhawthorne@kxly.com (Nick Hawthorne)
content: LINCOLN COUNTY, Wash. — Fire evacuations have been extended up to Bald Ridge Road, according to Lincoln County Sheriff's Office. Fire crews from Harrington, Reardan, DNR, Creston, and Davenport are on scene. Please avoid the area as crews continue to work. Updated at 4:31 According to the Lincoln County Sheriff's Office (LCSO), residents in the Cayuse Cove area should also be prepared to leave at this time. The Lincoln County Sheriff’s Office said the Lincoln County Fairgrounds, located at 1601 Morgan St. in Davenport, are also open for evacuation staging. Updated at 4:01 p.m. Level 2 (GET SET) evacuations have been issued for residents that live near the Spokane River off of Wynecoop Cayuse Mountain Road, according to Spokane Tribal Police. Spokane Tribal Police said this means you don’t have to leave your residence but be ready. Updated at 3:44 p.m. Level 3 (GO NOW) evacuations are in place for a large wildfire burning near Carp Lake and Western Pines Road approximately 10 miles north of Davenport, Washington. If you are in the area, evacuate immediately and stay out until further notice, according to the Lincoln County Sheriff's Office. Evacuation orders can also be views on the Lincoln County Sherriff's Facebook Page. This is a developing story. COPYRIGHT 2025 BY KXLY. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED. THIS MATERIAL MAY NOT BE PUBLISHED, BROADCAST, REWRITTEN OR REDISTRIBUTED.

title: Owensboro diocese to build new apartments for retired priests
creator: By Scott Hagerman Messenger-Inquirer
content: Retired priests in the Diocese of Owensboro have had the option of residing at the Bishop Cotton Apartments — behind the Carmel Home — since its construction in the mid-1980s But while the apartments were filled for years, the facility has been abandoned as a suitable retirement home, with only two of the eight 500 square-feet apartments — which are not handicapped accessible — currently in use by active priests. "People didn't know how to build for seniors back then," said The Most Rev. William F. Medley, bishop for the Owensboro diocese. "When I first came here 15 years ago, there were probably seven or eight priests living there. We haven't had our more recent retirees interested in going in there because its dated, and it wasn't well designed for seniors anyway. Bishop (John) McRaith told me when he lived there, he said, 'I wish I knew then what I know now, having moved in there.' "For example, the bathrooms, there was no special consideration given to seniors' needs." Renovating the apartments had been a consideration, but Medley said that quickly proved unrealistic. "Our first plan was to go in and figure out if maybe we could take these eight units and redesign the whole thing and have four units," he said. "But moving all of those walls, (bathrooms) and all that, it was just beyond. We tried to explore with some other parties if they could utilize it in some way, but any use would have such a massive investment that we really are going to find it's probably cheaper...

title: Traffic safety gets attention from Indiana officials four months after fatal accident
content: Four months after John and Loretta Reeger, of Clarksburg, were struck and fatally injured by a truck at a downtown Indiana intersection, the matter of traffic safety remains front-and-center with borough officials. In his report as chairman of the Public Safety Committee, Councilman Donald Lancaster told council that Police Chief Justin Schawl and Manager Nicole Sipos have had ongoing discussions with Pennsylvania Department of Transportation officials, including a walk-through the borough discussing intersections. title: Asaltos violentos tocan el Centro Histórico: ladrón solitario atraca hotel en Los Sapos
content: Un empleado del Hotel La Perla ubicado en pleno Centro Histórico fue encerrado en una bodega por un criminal armado que ingresó al lugar para llevarse el dinero en efectivo.Este día, se dio a conocer un vídeo que muestra el momento en que un hombre armado, de complexión robusta, ingresó la mañana del lunes al Hotel La Perla ubicado en el Callejón de Los Sapos en el Centro Histórico para atracar a un empleado y robarse el dinero. Únete a nuestro canal de WhatsApp para mantenerte informado al estilo de DIARIO CAMBIOEn la grabación, se muestra como el hombre ingresa solo y con pistola en mano, se acerca hasta donde se encontraba la víctima, a quien encierra en una pequeña bodega y comienza a amagarlo con el arma.Luego de algunos segundos, el criminal logra darse a la fuga con el dinero en efectivo que había en la caja, mientras que, la víctima tiempo después fue auxiliado por otra persona.The post Asaltos violentos tocan el Centro Histórico: ladrón solitario atraca hotel en Los Sapos appeared first on Diario Cambio.

title: Missoula seeks community input on intersection redesign
creator: Ethan Jamba NonStop Local Reporter
content: MISSOULA, Mont. – Residents have the opportunity to influence the redesign of a major intersection in Missoula. City officials and the Montana Department of Transportation are inviting input on plans for the West Broadway, Toole Avenue, and California Street junction. The intersection is known for its heavy traffic and is said to be in need of a safety upgrade. An open house is being held today for community members to provide feedback on its future. title: Missoula seeks community input on intersection redesign
creator: Ethan Jamba NonStop Local Reporter
content: MISSOULA, Mont. – Residents have the opportunity to influence the redesign of a major intersection in Missoula. City officials and the Montana Department of Transportation are inviting input on plans for the West Broadway, Toole Avenue, and California Street junction. The intersection is known for its heavy traffic and is said to be in need of a safety upgrade. An open house is being held today for community members to provide feedback on its future. Jeremy Keene, Director of Missoula Public Works & Mobility, emphasized the importance of the redesign. "We've been planning some improvements for the Broadway to California intersection for a few years. It's an intersection that we've seen some safety concerns and also some operational problems with the signal that's there today. So we're looking at options to improve that for both safety of all different users and also to help with access for some of the adjacent properties and area," he said. Engineers are evaluating options such as a multi-leg roundabout or an upgraded signal to enhance safety and ease navigation. The redesign is part of the broader West Broadway Corridor Plan, which includes future bikeways, housing, and streetscape enhancements. The aim is to finalize a design by next year, with construction potentially beginning in summer 2026. Keene shared insights on the community's perception of roundabouts. "You know, I think what typically happens with roundabouts is we have a lot of skepticism about how they'll work...

title: Kala Sri Mulyani Sentil Bank Dunia cs Ciut Hadapi Trump
content: Kala Sri Mulyani Sentil Bank Dunia cs Ciut Hadapi Trump Anisa Indraini - detikFinance Kamis, 10 Jul 2025 06:28 WIB Foto: Anisa Indraini Jakarta - Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati menyatakan peranan lembaga internasional dan multilateral hari-hari ini sangat lemah bahkan tidak dihormati. Kondisi ini yang kemudian menimbulkan invasi militer hingga perang dagang akibat kebijakan tarif Presiden Amerika Serikat (AS) Donald Trump. Lembaga yang dimaksud seperti Organisasi Perdagangan Dunia (WTO), Perserikatan Bangsa-bangsa (PBB), Dana Moneter Internasional (IMF), hingga Bank Dunia (World Bank). Padahal lembaga-lembaga itu dibentuk pasca Perang Dunia II untuk menyelesaikan sengketa hingga permasalahan yang terjadi antar negara. "Hari-hari ini peranan dari lembaga-lembaga multilateral itu menjadi sangat lemah atau tidak dihormati. Yang terjadi adalah hampir mirip dengan sebelum Perang Dunia II, yaitu kalau negara punya tujuan dan punya kepentingan, dia kemudian secara sepihak bisa memaksakan kehendaknya kepada negara lain," kata Sri Mulyani dalam rapat kerja dengan Komite IV DPD RI, Rabu (9/7/2025). SCROLL TO CONTINUE WITH CONTENT Sebagaimana diketahui, Trump telah mengumumkan tarif impor tinggi untuk mitra dagangnya yang akan berlaku mulai 1 Agustus 2025. Indonesia sendiri dikenakan tarif sebesar 32%, lebih tinggi dibandingkan Malaysia, Jepang dan Korea Selatan yang masing-masing 25%. Kondisi ini, menurut Sri Mulyani, membuat situasi global sangat tidak stabil (volatile) dan...

title: 尹, 두 번째 구속...오늘 중 정식 입소 절차
creator: 김선홍
content: [앵커] 늦은 밤까지 서울구치소 구인 피의자 대기실에서 결과를 기다리던 윤석열 전 대통령은 다시 정식 입소 절차를 밟게 됐습니다. 넉달 만에 두 번째 수감 생활을 이어가게 됐는데요. 자세한 내용 현장 취재기자 불러서 들어보죠. 김선홍 기자. [기자] 네, 서울 구치소에 나와있습니다. 오늘(10일) 새벽 윤석열 전 대통령에 대한 구속이 결정됐는데요, 지지자들이 몰려들었던 어젯밤과 달리 지금은 소수 인원이 남아있지만 비교적 고요한 상태입니다. 다만 오늘부터 윤 전 대통령이 다시 구치소에 수감되는 만큼 이곳에서 집회를 이어나갈 걸로 보입니다. 윤 전 대통령은 구속영장 실질심사를 마친 뒤 어젯밤 9시 30분쯤 이곳 서울 구치소에 도착했는데요, 서울중앙지법이 오늘 새벽 2시쯤 구속영장을 발부하면서 윤 전 대통령은 미결수 신분으로 두번째 입소 절차를 밟게 됐습니다. 신체검사와 머그샷 촬영, 수용번호 부여 등의 절차를 6개월만에 다시 또 치러야 하는 겁니다. 법무부 관계자에 따르면 아직 윤 전 대통령은 구인 피의자 대기실에 대기 중인데요, 구치소 측은 오늘 중으로 입소 절차를 끝낼 예정입니다. 다만 오늘 오전 10시 15분에 내란우두머리 혐의 재판이 예정돼 있어 윤 전 대통령의 출석 여부에 따라서 정확한 입소 시간이 정해질 걸로 보입니다. 구속취소 124일만의 재입소지만, 한 가지 다른 점은 현직 대통령 신분이었던 지난 번과 달리 이번에는 경호가 사라진다는 건데요. 지난 1월 구속 당시에는 구치소 담장을 경계로...

title: Prakiraan Cuaca Cirebon Kamis 10 Juli 2025, Cocok untuk Jalan-jalan Sore Bareng Keluarga
content: TRIBUNCIREBON.COM, CIREBON - Anda yang beraktivitas di Cirebon harus mempersiapkan sejumlah hal. Ini berkaitan dengan prediksi cuaca CIrebon hari ini. Menurut BMKG, seharian ini Kota Cirebon dan sekitarnya akan bercuaca cerah. Suhu udaranya berkisar antara 23 sampai 31 derajat celcius. Jadi jika Anda akan beraktivitas di luar rumah sebaiknya memakai sunscreen. Kemudian yang juga harus diperhatikan adalah angin kencang. Di malam nanti angin diperkirakan akan berembus dengan kecepatan 21 kilometer per jam ke arah tenggara. Jadi Anda sebaiknya memakai jaket atau semacamnya jika ingin jalan-jalan malam. iPhone 17 Air colorways leak
content: The iPhone 17 Air is now rumored to come in four colorways: black, silver, light gold, and light blue. The light blue will be "very light" according to one leaker, barely blue at all and more white in a lot of lighting scenarios. The subtlety theme continues with the light gold version, which is muted and not at all an in-your-face shade of gold. It seems like the overarching theme of this device will be lightness and thinness, and Apple doesn't want its colors to get in the way of that. The iPhone 17 Air is now rumored to sport the A19 Pro chip, though a lesser version than the one featured in the iPhone 17 Pro and Pro Max . Still, it's a step up from what the iPhone 16 Plus had to work with, and let's not forget that the iPhone 17 Air is replacing the iPhone 16 Plus. It will also get the same RAM amount as the Pros. So its only downsides will be the laughable battery capacity and the fact that it only has one rear camera. Perhaps a lot of people will be willing to overlook those in the name of thinness (5.5mm to 5.65mm) and lightness (145g). Via

title: FACT FOCUS: Trump misrepresents facts about wind power during Cabinet meeting
creator: Associated Press
content: By JENNIFER McDERMOTTPresident Donald Trump expressed his disdain for wind power during a meeting with his Cabinet recently, calling it an expensive form of energy that “smart” countries don’t use.Related ArticlesUS issues sanctions against UN investigator probing abuses in GazaTrump administration resumes sending some weapons to Ukraine after Pentagon pauseMan accused of Trump assassination attempt in Florida seeks to remove defense attorneys from caseRepublicans urge US universities to cut ties with Chinese-backed scholarship programNew lawsuit seeks to redraw Wisconsin’s congressional maps before 2026 midtermsHis comments on Tuesday contained false and misleading information about the use of wind power in the United States and around the world, and came on the heels of an executive order he signed Monday that would end subsidies around “green” energy.Here’s a look at the facts.CLAIM: “Wind is a very expensive form of energy.”THE FACTS: Onshore wind is one of the cheapest sources of electricity generation, with new wind farms expected to produce electricity around $30 per megawatt hour. This compares to a new natural gas plant, around $65 per megawatt hour, or a new advanced nuclear reactor, which runs over $80, according to estimates from the Energy Information Administration. Onshore wind farms cost less to build and operate than natural gas plants on average in most regions of the United States, even without tax credits. Though natural gas plants are available to...

title: Lauren James shines as England thrashes Netherlands 4-0 to revive Euro title defense
creator: By DANIELLA MATAR - AP Sports Writer
content: ZURICH (AP) — A “proper” England performance saw the Lionesses get the defense of their Women’s European Championship title firmly back on track with a 4-0 win over the Netherlands on Wednesday, thanks to a Lauren James double. James showed precisely why she had been selected despite not having played for more than two months when the squad was announced in June because of injury. The Chelsea forward was at the heart of England’s attacks and scored a sumptuous opener in the 22nd minute before netting her side’s third on the hour mark. James has been directly involved in 16 goals in her last 13 starts for England, with eight goals and eight assists. Georgia Stanway doubled England’s lead on the stroke of halftime and Ella Toone wrapped up the result in the 67th as the Lionesses gave the perfect response to their 2-1 defeat to France. "This is about showing who we are,” Stanway told the BBC. “We want to go back to proper England. LJ (Lauren James) set the tone with that goal and we all just followed.” Player-of-the-match Alessia Russo elaborated. “I think proper English to us just means we’ll work hard, we’ll work until we can’t run anymore, we stick together,” she said. "That’s our standard and our DNA as a team and we definitely saw that today from the first minute right until the end. “(We) probably could have scored even more as well ... it was definitely something that we wanted to return to and we know that we’re capable of performances like that.” It was a far more...

title: Joy Keene: Game Development Association Executive Director on the impact of the rebate
content: A tax rebate scheme's helped boost the number of people employed in the video game sector by more than 20%. The four-year, $160 million Game Development Sector Rebate allows eligible studios to claim back 20% of their spend. Forty studios will receive a share of $22.4 million this year, for its second year. Game Development Association Executive Director Joy Keene told Andrew Dickens the sector's booming compared to a few years ago. She says it's been a game-changer, as a lot of New Zealand studios were looking to move to Australia because of their rebate. LISTEN ABOVE

title: Trump imposes 50% tariffs on Brazil after public spat with Lula
content: President Donald Trump said on Wednesday that the U.S. would impose a 50% tariff on all imports from Brazil after a public spat this week with his Brazilian counterpart who called him an unwanted "emperor." In a letter, Trump linked the tariffs to Brazil's treatment of former President Jair Bolsonaro who is on trial over charges of plotting a coup to stop President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva from taking office in 2023. The levies were imposed due "in part to Brazil's insidious attacks on Free Elections, and the fundamental Free Speech Rights of Americans," the letter said. Brazil's real currency added to earlier losses to fall over 2% against the dollar after the announcement, and companies such as planemaker Embraer and oil major Petrobras also suffered setbacks in the U.S. stock market, as markets reacted to levies that are expected to inflict great pain in Brazil. The Brazilian government didn't immediately comment on Trump's tariffs, but Lula, his vice-president, his finance minister, and others were called to an emergency meeting in Brasilia on Wednesday night to discuss the new levies. The U.S. is Brazil's second-largest trading partner after China and the tariffs are a major increase from the 10% that were announced in April. Trump's letter said the 50% tariff will start August 1 and will be separate from all sectoral tariffs. On Monday, Lula attacked Trump after the U.S. leader had threatened to impose an additional 10% tariff on the BRICS group of developing nations...

title: US international Damion Downs joins Southampton in time for Wrexham opener
creator: AP
content: SOUTHAMPTON, England (AP) — U.S. international Damion Downs has joined Southampton from Cologne on a four-year deal. The 21-year-old striker, who played at the CONCACAF Gold Cup , scored 10 goals and set up five more to help Cologne to Bundesliga promotion by winning the German second division last season . Southampton was relegated from the Premier League last season in England and will host high-profile Wrexham in its opening game of the second-tier Championship on Aug. 9. “Everybody plays football to win titles. To win my first title at 20 last year was a great feeling, and I hope to repeat it again this year,” Downs said on Southampton’s website. German soccer magazine Kicker reported Southampton was paying up to 10 million euros ($11.7 million) for the American player. title: Menlu Sugiono Ungkap Seluruh Negara ASEAN Sepakat Tak akan Lakukan ‘Pembalasan’ terhadap AS
content: TRIBUNNEWS.COM, JAKARTA - Menteri Luar Negeri (Menlu) RI, Sugiono mengatakan seluruh negara anggota tetap ASEAN sepakat untuk tidak melakukan 'pembalasan' atas kebijakan tarif perdagangan AS. Negara-negara tersebut adalah Brunei Darussalam, Kamboja, Indonesia, Laos, Malaysia, Myanmar, Filipina, Singapura, Thailand, dan Vietnam. Baca juga: Industri Tekstil Minta Pemerintah Gerak Cepat Negosiasi Turunkan Tarif Impor Amerika 32 Persen Dalam acara Pertemuan Menteri-Menteri Luar Negeri ASEAN (AMM) ke-58 di Kuala Lumpur Convention Center (KLCC), Malaysia, Rabu (9/7/2025), Sugiono menyatakan negara- negara ASEAN lebih fokus membahas penguatan ekonomi lewat kerja sama perdagangan. "Tapi intinya adalah bahwa kita setuju untuk tidak ada retaliasi, tapi bagaimana memperkuat ekonomi kita masing-masing sebagai negara ASEAN ," kata Sugiono , Rabu. Namun menurutnya kebijakan tarif impor AS sebesar 32 persen bagi RI, memberikan kesadaran betapa penting negara dapat berdiri di atas kaki sendiri. Program Presiden Prabowo Subianto soal swasembada pangan dan energi, investasi terhadap sumber daya manusia, menurutnya sudah sejalan untuk menghadapi situasi global yang terus berkembang dan tidak menentu. "Ini merupakan sesuatu yang harus kita sadari bahwa it’s wake up call juga buat kita. Makanya saya kira apa yang dilakukan dan dicanangkan oleh Pak Presiden Prabowo sudah on the track. Kita ingin bisa swasembada memenuhi kebutuhan pangan, energi kita," katanya. Baca juga: Ancaman Trump Berlanjut,...

title: Ayuntamiento inaugura módulo itinerante ‘Yo Compro Poblano’ en Solesta ¡Consume local! (VIDEO)
content: En el primer módulo itinerante de “Yo Compro Poblano”, que se inauguró este miércoles en el centro comercial Solesta, para promover el consumo de productos locales, se espera recibir la afluencia aproximada de 350 mil personas que cada mes visitan esta plaza, afirmó el titular de la Secretaría de Economía y Turismo de Puebla capital, Jaime Oropeza Casas. #Entérate | El módulo “Yo Compro Poblano” para promover el consumo de productos locales fue inaugurado en el centro comercial Solesta. La inauguración estuvo encabezada por Jaime Oropeza, titular de Economía y Turismo de Puebla capital; Beatriz Camacho, presidenta de... pic.twitter.com/iOms4J8E1h— Diario Cambio (@Diario_Cambio) July 9, 2025 Como parte de las iniciativas del gobierno de Puebla capital del presidente Pepe Chedraui, el módulo “Yo compro Poblano” nace como un proyecto que busca poner al alcance de la sociedad productos hechos por artesanos y productores poblanos. Únete a nuestro canal de WhatsApp para mantenerte informado al estilo de DIARIO CAMBIOEl titular de la Secretaría de Economía y Turismo, informó que con esta iniciativa se han atendido a mil 200 emprendedores poblanos, de los cuales aproximadamente 300 son de juntas auxiliares del estado y alrededor del 70 por ciento de emprendedores son mujeres.En este sentido, agradeció el apoyo y convenio con la Asociación de Centros Comerciales de Puebla para facilitar la instalación de los módulos para ofrecer productos poblanos.“Quiero...

title: 尹 넉 달 만에 재구속...외환 혐의 입증 본격화
creator: 방준혁
content: [앵커] 윤석열 전 대통령이 구속취소로 석방된 지 넉 달 만에 다시 구속됐습니다. 법원은 증거 인멸 우려가 있다며 오늘 새벽 구속영장을 발부했는데요. 내란 특검팀이 있는 서울고등검찰청에 나가 있는 취재기자 연결합니다. 방준혁 기자! [기자] 네, 구속영장은 6시간 전인 새벽 2시 7분 발부됐습니다. 영장 심사를 진행한 남세진 부장 판사는 증거를 인멸할 염려가 있다며 윤 전 대통령에 대한 구속영장을 발부했습니다. 윤 전 대통령이 관련 혐의들을 부인하고 있어 증거를 인멸할 동기가 충분하고, 허위 공문서 작성과 외신을 상대로 한 허위 공보, 비화폰 삭제 등 구속사유에 해당하는 증거인멸을 했다는 내란 특검팀 주장을 인정한 것으로 보입니다. 앞서 영장 심사는 어제 오후 2시 20분쯤 시작해 6시간 40분 만인 밤 9시쯤 끝났는데요. 박억수 특검보를 비롯한 10명의 특검팀원은 178쪽 분량의 PPT를 준비해 와 범죄의 중대성과 재범 위험, 중요 참고인에 대한 위해 가능성 등을 구속이 필요한 근거로 제시했습니다. 윤 전 대통령은 20분가량 직접 발언을 하며 비화폰 삭제 지시와 총기 노출 지시 등 혐의를 부인하고 구속수사의 부당성을 주장했지만 받아들여지지 않았습니다. [앵커] 방 기자, 이제 윤 전 대통령이 구속 상태로 특검 수사를 받게 됐는데, 앞으로 수사 어떻게 진행됩니까? [기자] 네, 특검은 윤 전 대통령을 구인한 어제를 기준으로 최장 20일간 윤 전 대통령을 구속해 수사할 수 있습니다....

title: Ally Solutions Gains Momentum as the Most Affordable AI Front Desk for Small Businesses
creator: By Ally Solutions.ai
content: While big tech builds for enterprise, one company builds for Main Street. DENVER , July 9, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- As artificial intelligence continues to revolutionize how businesses operate, a growing number of small business owners are asking the same question: Where's the AI that's actually built for me? Ally Solutions, an AI tech startup headquartered in Denver , is answering that call, quietly becoming the go-to provider of affordable, human-like voice and chat assistants for small business owners across the U.S. While AI quickly becomes a standard tool for larger businesses, small teams are still struggling to access the tools they need. Most are either priced out, overwhelmed by complexity, or ignored altogether. Ally is changing that dynamic by giving small businesses a 24/7 AI-powered "front desk" without the enterprise price tag or technical barrier. Earlier this month, the company announced a new pricing model. $450 / month for Voice AI with unlimited minutes and full onboarding support. With the lowest price points in the industry, Ally is swiftly following through on its mission: to help business owners handle calls, boost customer support and conversions, and stay focused on what matters. A recent example from a Denver -based HVAC business owner juggling every role. Taking calls mid-job was costing opportunities. Missed calls meant missed leads, and handling admin while in the field wasn't sustainable. "We built Ally for the do-it-all business owners, the ones...

title: Israel insists on keeping troops in Gaza. That complicates truce talks with Hamas
content: JERUSALEM (AP) — As Israel and Hamas move closer to a ceasefire agreement , Israel says it wants to maintain troops in a southern corridor of the Gaza Strip — a condition that could derail the talks. An Israeli official said an outstanding issue in the negotiations was Israel's desire to keep forces in the territory during a 60-day truce, including in the east-west axis that Israel calls the Morag corridor. The official spoke on condition of anonymity because they weren't authorized to talk with the media about the negotiations. Javascript is required for you to be able to read premium content. Please enable it in your browser settings.

title: Indiana commissioners wipe -- almost clean -- the slate of opioid lawsuits
content: The Indiana County Board of Commissioners approved a series of multi-billion-dollar opioid settlements involving various pharmaceutical interests at its Wednesday meeting. “After over seven years of litigation, the Sackler family and Purdue (Pharma) bankruptcy brings together funds that we’ve been trying to get for a long time,” Indiana attorney Robert S. Marcus told reporters after the vote that also covered Alvogen, Amneal, Apotex, Hikma, Indivior, Mylan, Sun Pharma, Zydus and Sandor settlements. Javascript is required for you to be able to read premium content. Please enable it in your browser settings.

title: Chourio drives in winning run in 10th as Brewers win 3-2 and hand Dodgers their 6th straight loss
creator: By STEVE MEGARGEE - AP Sports Writer
content: MILWAUKEE (AP) — Jackson Chourio singled home the winning run in the 10th inning as the Milwaukee Brewers rallied to beat Los Angeles 3-2 on Wednesday to complete their first home sweep of the Dodgers in franchise history. The Brewers' only two previous sweeps of the Dodgers came at Los Angeles, in May 2012 and August 2017. The NL West-leading Dodgers have lost six straight. Milwaukee's Trevor Megill (2-2) struck out Freddie Freeman, Andy Pages and Tommy Edman in order in the top of the 10th. William Contreras led off the bottom of the 10th with a fly to deep center off Kirby Yates (4-3) that advanced automatic runner Sal Frelick to third. Chourio then singled through the left side of a drawn-in infield for his first career walk-off hit. The Brewers tied the game in the ninth when pinch-hitter Andrew Vaughn’s one-out single off Tanner Scott brought home Isaac Collins and put runners on the corners. Scott struck out Andruw Monasterio and retired Frelick on a grounder to second to force extra innings. Dodgers starter Tyler Glasnow struck out five and allowed one unearned run, three walks and two hits over five innings in his first appearance since April 27. He had been on the injured list with shoulder inflammation. Milwaukee’s José Quintana struck out four and allowed four walks, two hits and one run in six innings. He didn't allow a hit until Esteury Ruiz's two-out single in the fifth. The Dodgers broke a 1-all tie in the seventh and had a chance to extend their lead later...

He didn't allow a hit until Esteury Ruiz's two-out single in the fifth. The Dodgers broke a 1-all tie in the seventh and had a chance to extend their lead later...

title: Chourio drives in winning run in 10th as Brewers win 3-2 and hand Dodgers their 6th straight loss
creator: By STEVE MEGARGEE - AP Sports Writer
content: MILWAUKEE (AP) — Jackson Chourio singled home the winning run in the 10th inning as the Milwaukee Brewers rallied to beat Los Angeles 3-2 on Wednesday to complete their first home sweep of the Dodgers in franchise history. The Brewers' only two previous sweeps of the Dodgers came at Los Angeles, in May 2012 and August 2017. The NL West-leading Dodgers have lost six straight. Milwaukee's Trevor Megill (2-2) struck out Freddie Freeman, Andy Pages and Tommy Edman in order in the top of the 10th. William Contreras led off the bottom of the 10th with a fly to deep center off Kirby Yates (4-3) that advanced automatic runner Sal Frelick to third. Chourio then singled through the left side of a drawn-in infield for his first career walk-off hit. The Brewers tied the game in the ninth when pinch-hitter Andrew Vaughn’s one-out single off Tanner Scott brought home Isaac Collins and put runners on the corners. Scott struck out Andruw Monasterio and retired Frelick on a grounder to second to force extra innings. Dodgers starter Tyler Glasnow struck out five and allowed one unearned run, three walks and two hits over five innings in his first appearance since April 27. He had been on the injured list with shoulder inflammation. Milwaukee’s José Quintana struck out four and allowed four walks, two hits and one run in six innings. He didn't allow a hit until Esteury Ruiz's two-out single in the fifth. The Dodgers broke a 1-all tie in the seventh and had a chance to extend their lead later...

title: NFL players' union to appeal arbitrator ruling on collusion: report
creator: AFP AFP
content: The NFL Players Association is appealing an arbitrators' ruling that found insufficient evidence of collusion among team owners over salary negotiations, ESPN reported on Wednesday. ESPN cited an unnamed "senior union source" as saying the appeal "is a reflection of our obligation to enforce the collective bargaining agreement and our commitment to protecting our players' interests." In the ruling rendered on January 14, 2025, arbitrator Christopher Droney wrote that there was "little question" that the NFL management council, with the blessing of commissioner Roger Goodell, had encouraged the 32 clubs to reduce guarantees in veterans' contracts at the March 2022 annual owners' meeting. Droney concluded, however, that there was no clear evidence that teams actually colluded to reduce guaranteed player compensation. Droney's decision didn't become public until June 24, when podcaster Pablo Torre and Mike Florio of ProFootballTalk.com unveiled the 61-page ruling. Torre and Florio said the NFL and the NFLPA had kept the outcome private, and ESPN reported Wednesday that "senior leaders" of the union had struck "an unusual confidentiality agreement" with the league that kept the details of the arbitration decision now being appealed from most of its members. The original case sent to arbitration concerned talks among league executives and owners after the Cleveland Browns signed quarterback Deshaun Watson to a five-year, $230 million contract, all of it guaranteed, in March 2022....

title: El Gobierno de Venezuela discute la cooperación energética con Turquía y Arabia Saudita
creator: AL Día y a la Hora | @Notidiahora
content: Noticias al Día y a la Hora | Últimas Noticias del día de hoyLa vicepresidenta Ejecutiva, Delcy Rodríguez, informó que durante una reunión con el ministro de Energía de Turquía, Alparslan Bayraktar, revisaron planes conjuntos en materia de «exploración, producción y comercialización de hidrocarburos».El Gobierno de Venezuela revisó planes conjuntos con Turquía y una cooperación bilateral con Arabia Saudita en materia energética, informó este miércoles la ministra de Hidrocarburos, Delcy Rodríguez, quien viajó a Austria para participar en el noveno Seminario Internacional de la Organización de Países Exportadores de Petróleo (OPEP).A través de un mensaje en Telegram, la también vicepresidenta ejecutiva de Venezuela afirmó que sostuvo un encuentro en Viena con el ministro de Energía de Turquía, Alparslan Bayraktar, en el que revisaron los planes conjuntos que han trazado sus naciones en términos de «exploración, producción y comercialización de hidrocarburos».«Como aliados estratégicos seguimos avanzando en nuestra cooperación para el desarrollo de nuestros pueblos», agregó Rodríguez en su publicación.Asimismo, la funcionaria señaló que discutió junto al ministro de Energía saudí, Abdulaziz bin Salman Al Saud, la cooperación de los países dentro de la OPEP y la alianza ampliada OPEP+, integrada por los miembros del bloque petrolero y sus aliados.«Destacamos la cohesión y unión de nuestra organización y funcionamiento del acuerdo...

title: Trump administration resumes sending some weapons to Ukraine after Pentagon pause
content: The Trump administration has resumed sending some weapons to Ukraine, a week after the Pentagon had directed that some deliveries be paused, U.S. officials said Wednesday. The weapons heading into Ukraine include 155 mm munitions and precision-guided rockets known as GMLRS, two officials told The Associated Press on the condition of anonymity to provide details that had not been announced publicly. It’s unclear exactly when the weapons started moving. Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth directed the pause on some shipments last week to allow the Pentagon to assess its weapons stockpiles, in a move that caught the White House by surprise. Affected was Patriot missiles, the precision-guided GMLRS, Hellfire missiles, Howitzer rounds and more, taking not only Ukrainian officials and other allies by surprise but also U.S. lawmakers and other parts of the Trump administration, including the State Department. It was not clear if a pause on Patriot missiles would hold. The $4 million munition is in high demand and was key to defending a major U.S. air base in Qatar last month as Iran launched a ballistic missile attack in response to the U.S. targeting its nuclear facilities. President Donald Trump announced Monday that the U.S. would continue to deliver defensive weapons to Ukraine. He has sidestepped questions about who ordered the pause in exchanges with reporters this week. “I would know if a decision is made. I will know,” Trump said Wednesday. “I will be the first to know. In fact,...

title: СМИ узнали об условии Трампа для введения санкций против РФ
creator: Ревтов Дмитрий Анатольевич
content: Президент США Дональд Трамп поддержит проект конгресса о введении новых антироссийских санкций при условии расширения его полномочий. Об этом 9 июля сообщает газета Politico со ссылкой на источники. «Администрация не позволит конгрессу управлять внешней политикой президента. Законопроект должен включать полноценные полномочия по освобождению от санкций», — говорится в публикации. Таким образом, американский лидер пойдет на одобрение новых ограничений только при возможности предоставления ему полномочий по их отмене в дальнейшем. Отмечается, что текущая редакция законопроекта позволяет президенту США отменить введение пошлин в 500% на импорт из стран, закупающих российскую нефть и уран. При этом американский сенатор-республиканец Линдси Грэм (внесен в российский перечень террористов и экстремистов) согласился указать в законопроекте возможность Трампа повторно отменить введенные ограничения с позволения конгресса. В этот же день Трамп заявил, что введение новых санкций зависит от него. Новый уровень заинтересованности президента США в ужесточении антироссийских рестрикций в том числе связан с более прозрачной законодательной повесткой конгресса.

title: EEUU impone aranceles de 50% a productos de Brasil por "cacería de brujas" contra Bolsonaro
creator: Por JOSH BOAK - Associated Press
content: WASHINGTON (AP) — El presidente de Estados Unidos, Donald Trump, anunció que impondrá aranceles del 50% a los productos importados de Brasil por lo que dijo era el trato al expresidente brasileño Jair Bolsonaro, mostrando que las disputas personales, más que la economía, guían la aplicación de impuestos por parte del mandatario estadounidense. Trump vinculó específicamente sus aranceles al juicio de Bolsonaro, quien está acusado de intentar revertir su derrota electoral de 2022. Trump ha descrito a Bolsonaro como un amigo y recibió al expresidente brasileño en su resort de Mar- a-Lago cuando ambos estaban en el poder en 2020. "Este juicio no debería estar teniendo lugar", escribió Trump en una carta publicada en Truth Social. “Es una cacería de brujas que debería terminar inmediatamente”. Existe cierto sentido de afinidad, ya que Trump fue encausado en 2023 por sus esfuerzos para revertir los resultados de las elecciones presidenciales de Estados Unidos de 2020. El presidente de Estados Unidos dirigió su carta de aranceles al presidente brasileño Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva, quien derrotó a Bolsonaro en 2022. Bolsonaro testificó ante el Supremo Tribunal Federal en junio por el supuesto complot para permanecer en el poder después de su derrota electoral de 2022. Los jueces escucharán a otros 26 acusados en los próximos meses. Una decisión podría darse en septiembre, dicen los analistas legales. Bolsonaro ya ha sido inhabilitado por las autoridades...

title: Elie Saab blends 19th-century romance with red carpet precision in fall couture
creator: By THOMAS ADAMSON - AP Fashion Writer
content: PARIS (AP) — Elie Saab , the Lebanese designer long favored on the red carpet, returned to familiar territory on Wednesday, with fall haute couture — and did so unapologetically. Fashion insiders gathered in Paris among marble columns as models descended a gilded stone staircase to the strains of harpsichord music, setting the tone for a collection steeped in historical romance. Saab leaned into his signature codes: sumptuous velvets, gowns gathered at the back, and pearl and jewel-adorned chokers. Floral appliqués — another hallmark — appeared throughout, anchoring the collection in the romanticism that has defined the house for decades. This was a particularly thoughtful collection, evoking Romantic silhouettes from the turn of the 19th century in Europe. The soft draping and historical references gave the show a sense of emotional depth beyond its surface opulence. The color palette ranged from deep emeralds and sapphires to dusky mauves, offering a moody backdrop for the jewel-encrusted embroidery that shimmered under the lights. Among the standout pieces were gowns with cascading trains and bejeweled details, encasing the body in a kind of luxurious cage. Though luxury and opulence may be Saab’s well-trodden path, he showed that consistency remains its own form of artistry. Saab’s couture is less about surprise and more about control — control of silhouette, embellishment, and fantasy. Where other houses have veered into avant-garde or gender-fluid territory this...

title: Real Madrid yang Tidak Sabar Dibantai PSG 4-0, Xabi: 10 Menit Pertama Mematikan Kami
content: TRIBUNNEWS.COM - Paris Saint-Germain (PSG) membantai Real Madrid dengan skor mencolok 4-0 dalam pertandingan semifinal Piala Dunia Antarklub 2025 di MetLife Stadium, Kamis (10/7/2025). Saat babak pertama belum genap 10 menit, PSG sudah unggul 2-0 lewat gol Fabian Ruiz (6') dan Ousmane Dembele tiga menit berselang. Dua gol tersebut berawal dari kesalahan pemain bertahan Real Madrid . PSG mampu menambah keunggulan pada menit 24 lewat sontekan Fabian Ruiz, dan tambahan satu gol dari Goncalo Ramos dalam 10 menit terakhir Waktu normal (87'). PSG seakan memberi pelajaran berharga untuk Real Madrid . Absennya Dean Huijsen karena hukuman kartu merah membuat Asensio main sebagai starter dan Valverde Kembali ke posisi bek sayap. Perubahan yang terjadi di lini pertahanan Real Madrid di bawah asuhan Xabi Alonso dalam pertandingan ini menggambarkan betapa banyak kelemahan mereka. Terutama dalam 10 menit pertama yang mematikan. Dua gol hanya dalam tempo 5 menit. Dua kesalahan fatal pemain bertahan Los Blancos dibayar mahal dengan gol lawan. Tidak hanya itu, mentalitas pun harus terenggut karena dominasi yang begitu kuat oleh anak asuh Luis Enrique . "Awal pertandingan sangat penting," kata Alonso dikutip Managing Madrid . PSG bermain dengan baik," sambungnya. "Kami mengalami penurunan yang nyata...

title: Daftar Harga BBM Pertamina Hari Ini Kamis 9 Juli 2025, Pertamax Naik Jadi Rp 12.500, Cek Lainnya
One canal, two cities, two plans: Canal Fest adjusts in 2025
content: NORTH TONAWANDA, N.Y. — A longtime summer tradition in Western New York is getting a bit of a shake-up this year. Canal Fest, usually an eight-day celebration shared by Tonawanda and North Tonawanda , will be shorter on one side of the canal this year, organizers told 2 On Your Side . Canal Fest has been a shared summer tradition between the cities of Tonawanda and North Tonawanda for more than 40 years. But this year, the festival won't look the same on both sides of the canal. In Tonawanda, the event will run six days instead of eight after city leaders voted to scale back. With Tonawanda stepping back, North Tonawanda is taking on more responsibility, including hosting all the rides. City officials still expect more than 100,000 people to attend on both sides of the canal. North Tonawanda Mayor Austin Tylec said they don't anticipate overwhelming crowds on just one side. "I think it's still going to be a successful event even with the reduction on the Tonawanda side with days. It is still going to have the meat and bones of Canal Fest. We aren't too nervous about being overworked in our first responders, police, fire, parks, DPW. We're confident we can bear that extra weight," Mayor Tylec said. Despite the changes, both cities say Canal Fest remains a celebration of summer, community and now, compromise. Canal Fest on the North Tonawanda side starts this Sunday. The rides officially open Tuesday. RELATED: Town of Tonawanda police union and town come to agreement after...

title: Ramalan Zodiak Lengkap Hari Ini Jumat 11 Juli 2025: Transformasi Besar saat Bulan Purnama Capricorn
content: - Bulan Purnama yang terjadi pada Jumat, 11 Juli 2025, membawa energi kuat untuk refleksi dan transformasi. Ini adalah waktu ideal bagi semua zodiak untuk menghadapi kebenaran, melepaskan beban lama, dan membangun masa depan yang lebih otentik. Simak ramalan lengkap 12 zodiak hari ini dan temukan afirmasi positif yang tepat untuk langkahmu. Hari ini, Aries akan menyaksikan hasil kerja keras yang selama ini diperjuangkan dalam diam. Bulan Purnama Capricorn menguji tekadmu: terus mengulang kegagalan atau membangun sesuatu yang bertahan? Saya memiliki kekuatan saya sendiri dan membangun warisan saya dengan keberanian yang luar biasa. Taurus, pertanyakan rasa aman yang kamu genggam. Apakah itu kenyamanan sejati atau hanya rutinitas lama? Waktunya membuka ruang bagi pertumbuhan jiwa. Aku melepaskan apa yang tak lagi berguna dan merangkul kelimpahan sejati. Gemini, cukup sudah dengan basa-basi. Bulan Purnama ini menyerukan revolusi ide dan keberanian untuk bersuara. Dunia siap mendengarkan. Aku mengungkapkan kebenaranku dengan berani dan tanpa validasi. Cancer, kamu tak bisa menyembuhkan luka yang disembunyikan. Saatnya jujur pada perasaanmu dan membiarkan cinta yang tulus masuk. Saya menyembuhkan diri dengan berbagi kebenaran saya dengan orang-orang terkasih. Leo, relasi yang sehat menuntut kedalaman, bukan hanya kilau di permukaan. title: Pope prays for world to recognize urgency of climate crisis as he celebrates Mass' using new rite
content: VATICAN CITY, — Pope Leo XIV prayed Wednesday for the world to recognize the urgency of the climate crisis and “hear the cry of the poor,” as he celebrated the first papal Mass using a new set of prayers and readings inspired by Pope Francis' environmental legacy. The Mass, in the gardens of the Vatican’s new ecological educational center at the papal summer estate in Castel Gandolfo, indicated a strong line of ecological continuity with Francis , who made environmental protection a hallmark of his pontificate. Wearing flowing green vestments, Leo presided at the Mass in front of a statue of the Madonna and at the foot of a reflecting pool, immersed in the lush green gardens on an unusually cool summer day. He said the world needed to change its mindset about the planet and what is causing “the world to burn.” “We must pray for the conversion of so many people, inside and out of the church, who still don't recognize the urgency of caring for our common home,” he said. “We see so many natural disasters in the world, nearly every day and in so many countries, that are in part caused by the excesses of being human, with our lifestyle.” The private Mass was celebrated for about 50 staffers of the Laudato Si center, named for Francis’ 2015 environmental encyclical, in which the first pope from the Global South blasted the way wealthy countries and multinational corporations had exploited the Earth and its most vulnerable people for profit. Leo approved the new Mass formula “for...

title: Motorlux Announces Bespoke Hospitality and Curated Vehicle Displays for Monterey Car Week Premier
creator: By Hagerty

title: Motorlux Announces Bespoke Hospitality and Curated Vehicle Displays for Monterey Car Week Premier
creator: By Hagerty
content: TRAVERSE CITY, Mich. , July 9, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Motorlux is set to return on Wednesday, August 13, 2025 , once again kicking-off Monterey Car Week with a premium blend of car culture, luxury aviation and elevated hospitality. The event continues to celebrate the culinary richness of California with three Michelin-starred chefs presenting exclusive dishes as well as tastings from more than 40 of the region's most acclaimed varietals of wine, blending fine dining with the energy of the automotive celebration. Guests will once again be treated to the fashion-show-inspired opening night of the Broad Arrow Monterey Jet Center Auction, representing early access to one of the week's premier collector car sales. Motorlux continues its tradition of immersive automotive exhibits, with curated food and drink pairings tailored to each. This year's highlights include: "Welcoming Motorlux guests means constantly raising the bar on entertainment and hospitality," said Logan Calkins , Director of Events at Hagerty. "We can't wait to host thousands of luxury and automotive enthusiasts as they reunite with longtime friends and Monterey Car Week kicks-off at Motorlux." Broad Arrow Monterey Jet Center Auction Broad Arrow Auctions will once again join Motorlux for their flagship Monterey Jet Center Auction, August 13-14 , featuring an impressive roster of approximately 150 collector cars.
